Question:
He aha te āhua o te huinga whitiāhua Magnolia o te tau 1999?
A.California
B.South Carolina
C.Hōria
D.TeKiki
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko C. Hōria.

I whakaahuatia te kiriata Magnolia i te tau 1999 i te tāone o Los Angeles, California, engari i whakatūria kē i te rohe o San Fernando Valley. Heoi, ko te kaupapa matua o te kiriata e hāngai ana ki ngā hononga i waenga i ngā kiritaki rerekē e noho ana i te tāone o Hōria.

Question:
Ko te kōhuru ture rānei i mahia e te Minita whenua X ki rāwāhi he mahi whakarihariha, he gestionis rānei?
A.He mahi tūmatanui taua whanonga (he imperii)
B.E kore rawa taua whanonga e kawe i te āraitanga
C.He mahi tūmataiti taua whanonga (he gestionis)
D.He mahi tūmatanui taua whanonga, engari e whakangungua ana e te āraitanga
GivenAnswer:
C. He mahi tūmataiti taua whanonga (he gestionis)

I tēnei āhuatanga, ko te kōhuru ture i mahia e te Minita whenua X ki rāwāhi he mahi tūmataiti, arā he mahi gestionis. Ahakoa he Minita a X, kāore tana mahi kōhuru i te whai pānga ki tana tūranga ōkawa hei Minita, nō reira kāore i te noho hei mahi tūmatanui (imperii). He mahi takitahi, tūmataiti kē.

Question:
He aha te reo whai mana o Hōrana?
A.Reo Teina
B.Reo Huitene
C.Reo Tiamana
D.Reo Tatimana
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B. Ko te reo whai mana o Hōrana ko te reo Huitene (Dutch).

I roto i te whenua o Hōrana, ko te reo Huitene te reo matua e kōrerotia ana e te nuinga o ngā tāngata. He reo Germanic te reo Huitene, ā, he hononga tōna ki ētahi atu reo pērā i te reo Ingarihi me te reo Tiamana.

Ahakoa he maha ngā reo e kōrerotia ana i Hōrana, ko te reo Huitene anake te reo whai mana, arā, te reo ōkawa o te kāwanatanga me ngā hinonga kāwanatanga.

Question:
He aha te kaitapere o te reo māori o Te Kaitapere o Te Kaitapere?
A.Reo Pāniora
B.Reo Rūhia
C.Reo Tiamana
D.Reo Wīwī
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te D. Reo Wīwī.

I roto i te pātai, e pātai ana mō te reo kaitapere o te kapa haka o Te Kaitapere. He mea nui te mōhio ko te reo Wīwī te reo matua o Wīwī, ā, koinei hoki te reo e kōrerotia ana e te nuinga o ngā tāngata o taua whenua. Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika ko te Reo Wīwī, kaua ko ētahi atu reo pērā i te reo Pāniora, reo Rūhia, reo Tiamana rānei.

Question:
Ko ngā Mutations e pā ana ki te pānga ka taea te whakawātea hei:
A.He tōraro kaha.

Ehara i te mea he tōraro kaha (A), he āhua o te āhua o te āhua o (C), he ngaronga-o-te-mahi (D) rānei ngā hua o ngā mutations e pā ana ki te pānga.

Question:
He tau, i whakatata atu ki te mano tata rawa, e 47,000. Ko tēhea tau pea te tau i whakatatatia?
A.46,295
B.46,504
C.47,520
D.47,924
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora e hoa, ko te whakautu tika ko te B. 46,504.

I te mea kei te kimi tātou i te tau e tata ana ki te 47,000, me whakatata atu ki te mano tata rawa. Nā, ko te 46,504 te tau tata rawa ki te 47,000 i roto i ngā kōwhiringa e whā.

Ko te 46,295 kei raro iho i te 46,504, ā, ko te 47,520 me te 47,924 kei runga ake i te 47,000. Nō reira, ko te 46,504 te whakautu tika.

Question:
Kai roto te kura i te āhua o te porotoru. Mēnā he rohe tapawhā 116 waewae tapawhā tō te pūtake tapatoru, ā, e 30 waewae te roa o te kura, e hia te nui o te wai e mau ana i te kura ina kī?
A.1725 ft^3
B.1740 ft^3
C.3480 ft^3
D.6960 ft^3
GivenAnswer:
Kia whakaaro tātou mō tēnei pātai:

1. Ko te āhua o te kura he porotoru (triangular prism).
2. Ko te rohe o te pūtake tapatoru (base triangle) ko 116 waewae tapawhā (square feet).
3. Ko te roa o te kura ko 30 waewae (feet).

Hei whakautu i te pātai "e hia te nui o te wai e mau ana i te kura ina kī?", me whakamahi tātou i te ture rōrahi o te porotoru:

Rōrahi o te porotoru = Rohe o te pūtake tapatoru × Te roa

Nā, whakaurua ngā tau:
Rōrahi = 116 ft² × 30 ft
        = 3,480 ft³

Nō reira, te whakautu tika ko C. 3480 ft³.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā āhuatanga e whai ake nei e ōrite ana ki te hīkaka rā?
A.whakamahi i te tōpana nui rawa
B.i whakaritea kētia
C.whakahauhau ā-waha
D.ko te whakamahinga o te patu
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B - i whakaritea kētia.

He ōrite te hīkaka rā ki te mea i whakaritea kētia, nā te mea ko te hīkaka rā he momo whakarite, he mahere rānei kua oti kē te whakarite i mua i te wā tīmata. Pērā i te hīkaka rā, kua whakaritea kētia ngā mahi, ngā wāhanga me ngā tikanga o tētahi kaupapa i mua i tōna whakatutukitanga.

Kāore e ōrite ana ngā kōwhiringa A, C me D ki te hīkaka rā, nā te mea kāore ēnei e pā ana ki te whakaritenga o tētahi mahere i mua i tōna whakatutukitanga.

Question:
E pāngia ana e te tūroro he kakī pakaru me te tūkino ki te aho tuaiwi i te taumata o te ono o nga vertebra.
A.Kaore e taea e rātau te whakangā me te kore tautoko ora.
B.Ka āhei anake rātau ki te hā mārire.
C.E kore e taea te matapae i te pānga o te hā.
D.Ka kore e pāngia te mea nui.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te A: Kaore e taea e rātau te whakangā me te kore tautoko ora.

Ki te pāngia te aho tuaiwi i te taumata o te ono o ngā vertebra (C6), ka pā ki ngā uaua e whakahaere ana i te whakangā. Nā te mea kua pakaru te kakī, kua kore e taea te whakahaere i aua uaua, nā reira kaore e taea te whakangā me te kore tautoko ora.

Ehara i te mea ka pā noa ki te hā mārie (B), engari ka kore rawa e taea te whakangā. Kāore e taea te matapae i te pānga tūturu ki te hā (C), engari he nui te pānga ki te whakangā. Ā, he nui te pānga o tēnei tūāhua, kāore e taea te kī ka kore e pāngia te mea nui (D).

Question:
Kei tēnei utauta mākete me te utauta whakawhitiwhiti he poapoa hāngai, he tohutohu rānei hei whakahau i ngā kiritaki kia hoko hua/ratonga:
A.Pānuitanga.
B.Te pānga tūmatanui.
C.Whakatairanga hoko.
D.Mākete hāngai.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te C. Whakatairanga hoko.

Ko te whakatairanga hoko te mahi whakatairanga e aro tika ana ki te whakahau i ngā kiritaki kia hoko hua, ratonga rānei. He rerekē tēnei i te pānuitanga whānui, i te pānga tūmatanui rānei e aro ana ki te whakapiki i te mōhiotanga, i te māramatanga o te iwi whānui ki tētahi kaupapa, umanga, whakahaere rānei. 

Ko te mākete hāngai tētahi rautaki mākete e aro ana ki te tūhura i ngā hiahia me ngā wawata o tētahi rōpū kiritaki tauwhāiti, engari ehara i te mea ka kawea e tēnei te hoko tika o ngā hua.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei rīhi i hangaia mai i nga whakataetae poaka?
A.kohua
B.kiore
C.kaha
D.pura
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te D. pura.

I roto i te reo Māori, ko te kupu 'pura' e ahu mai ana i te kupu Pākehā mō te 'boar' - he poaka toa, he poaka tāne rānei. I ētahi wā, ka whakamahia hei ingoa mō ngā kurī kaha, ngā kurī whawhai rānei i ahu mai i ngā momo poaka nei.

Kāore he hononga o ngā kupu 'kohua' (he mea hanga hei mahi kai), 'kiore' (he kararehe iti), me te 'kaha' (he āhuatanga o te kaha, te pakari, te tōngakingaki rānei) ki ngā whakataetae poaka.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā take e whai ake nei ka whakaarotia he āhuatanga "pull" mō Riva ina whakaaro koe ki tētahi nekehanga mai i Īnia ki Te Hononga o Amerika?
A.Tuwhāhia te rawakore
B.He pai ake te mahi me ngā utu nui ake
C.Pūnaha maka a Īnia
D.He tukino i tōna hoa noho
GivenAnswer:
Ko te B te whakautu tika - he pai ake te mahi me ngā utu nui ake i Te Hononga o Amerika. He āhuatanga "pull" tēnei e kukume ana i a Riva ki reira, he mea pai ake i ngā āhuatanga o Īnia. 

Ko ētahi atu āhuatanga "pull" ko te oranga pai ake, ngā ratonga hauora, mātauranga pai ake me te noho haumaru. Ka hiahia pea a Riva ki te whai i ēnei mea mōna anō, mō tōna whānau hoki mēnā he tamariki āna.

Ehara te rawakore, te pūnaha maka, me te tūkino i te hoa noho i te mea pai, nā reira ehara ērā i ngā āhuatanga ka kukume i a ia ki Te Hononga o Amerika. Ko ērā ngā mea ka pana kē i a ia ki wāhi kē.

Question:
Tāutua te āhuatanga o te tono here e whai ake nei: Ka toa anake ngā Pī i ta rātau kēmu tuatahi mēnā kāore ngā Aardvarks, ngā Chipmunks rānei e toa i a rātou kēmu tuatahi.
A.Kaore nga Aardvarks e toa i ta rātau kēmu tuatahi.
B.I toa nga Pī i ta rātau kēmu tuatahi.
C.Kaore nga Chipmunks e toa i ta rātau kēmu tuatahi.
D.Kaore nga Aardvarks, nga Chipmunks rānei e toa i a rātau kēmu tuatahi.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te D: Kaore nga Aardvarks, nga Chipmunks rānei e toa i a rātau kēmu tuatahi.

Kei te kī te tono here:
"Ka toa anake ngā Pī i ta rātau kēmu tuatahi mēnā kāore ngā Aardvarks, ngā Chipmunks rānei e toa i a rātou kēmu tuatahi."

Nā, mēnā i toa ngā Pī i tā rātau kēmu tuatahi (B), me mōhio tātou kāore ngā Aardvarks me ngā Chipmunks i toa i ā rātou kēmu tuatahi (D).

Engari, kāore e taea te kī mēnā kāore ngā Aardvarks (A) me ngā Chipmunks (C) i toa i ā rātou kēmu tuatahi, i toa ngā Pī i tā rātau kēmu tuatahi. Kāore te tono here e kōrero mō tērā.

Nō reira, ko te D anake te whakautu e hāngai pū ana ki ngā kōrero kei te tono here.

Question:
He momo motuhake te hinganga o te tuakiri o te mātauranga
A.Te hinganga o te aituā
B.matawaenga teka
C.E tono ana i te pātai
D.Whakaaro Porohita
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora e hoa. Ko tēnei he pātai mō te reo Māori. Kei te pātai koe mō te tikanga o te kīanga "te hinganga o te tuakiri o te mātauranga". 

Ki taku mōhio, ko te whakautu tika ko te C: "E tono ana i te pātai". Ko te tikanga o tēnei kīanga ko te āhuatanga o te rapu i te mātauranga, me te whakapātaritari i ngā whakaaro o mua mā te pātai. Mā te pātai ka āhei tātou ki te whakawhanake i tō tātou māramatanga.

Ehara i te mea ko te hinganga o te aituā, he matawaenga teka rānei, he whakaaro porohita rānei te tikanga o taua kīanga. Engari ko te tūāpapa o te mātauranga ko te pātai me te rangahau.

Nā reira, ko taku whakautu ko te C, "E tono ana i te pātai". He pēhea ōu whakaaro?

Question:
Te āhua nei he nui ake te ____ o ngā pakeke pakeke, tamariki rānei
A.Whakanao
B.Pūroro
C.Kāore e taea te whakaae
D.Ētahi
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora e hoa, ko taku whakautu ki tēnei pātai ko te C - Kāore e taea te whakaae.

Kāore he mōhiohio i homai e koe hei taunaki i te whakapae he nui ake te whakanao, te pūroro rānei o ngā pakeke, tamariki rānei. Me whai raraunga tātou hei taunaki i ēnei momo kōrero, pērā i ngā tatauranga, ngā rangahau rānei e whakaatu ana i ngā rerekētanga o te whakanao, te pūroro rānei i waenga i ngā reanga pakeke me ngā tamariki. 

Nā reira, ki tāku nei whakaaro, kāore e taea te whakaae, te whakahē rānei i tēnei whakapae me te kore raraunga hei taunaki. Me rapu tonu pea tātou kia mārama ai mehemea he rerekētanga tūturu tō te whakanao me te pūroro i waenga i ēnei rōpū e rua.

Question:
Ko te whakawāteatanga whakawhiti-kōpaki K-kōpaki ko te
A.rarangi i K
B.tapawhā i K
C.putoru i K
D.taurea i K
GivenAnswer:
Ko taku whakautu ki tēnei pātai, ko te kōwhiringa C - putoru i K.

I roto i te pāngarau, ko te whakawāteatanga whakawhiti-kōpaki K-kōpaki te putoru i K. He mea hanga te putoru mā te whakawhitiwhiti i ngā kōpaki e rua o K, ā, ka puta ko tētahi āhuatanga hou, arā, ko te putoru.

Hei tauira, ki te whakawhitiwhitia ngā kōpaki e rua o R (ngā nama tūturu), ka puta ko te papa taurea, tētahi momo putoru. Engari, ehara te rarangi, te tapawhā rānei i te putoru nā te mea kāore i te ōrite te maha o ngā aronga (dimensions) o aua āhuatanga ki te maha o ngā aronga o te putoru.

Nō reira, ko te putoru te whakawāteatanga tika o te whakawhitiwhitinga o ngā kōpaki e rua o K.

Question:
E pā ana tēnei pātai ki ngā mōhiohio e whai ake nei.
I te tuatahi me kōrero tātau he āhua tūturu nga cosmos, nā te mea he tino tika tēnei puka e hiahia ana ki te kore he hononga, ko te tino katoa, ko tētahi wāhanga nā te mea ko te āhua tino ātaahua, e tino pai ana ki te pupuri me te pupuri i ngā mea katoa; Na, ko nga wahi rangatira katoa o te ao nui, ara ko te ra, ko te marama me nga aorangi e puta mai ana i tenei ahua Nā te mea rānei e tohe ana ngā mea katoa ki te whiwhi i tēnei puka, e puta ana ki te take o te pata wai me ētahi atu tinana kūtere ki te ngana rātau ki te whakamārama i a rātau anō. Na, kaore tētahi tangata e rangirua nā nga tinana o te rangi tēnei āhua. ...
Koia i tua atu i te ui te whenua, no te mea e pehi ana i nga taha katoa i runga i tona waenganui. Ahakoa i te take o nga hua o nga maunga me nga pōreareatanga o nga awaawa kāore e taea te mārama ki te porohita tino tika, engari kaore tēnei e pā ki te āhua o te whenua. ...
E ai ki te mea kua whakaaturia kētia kei te whenua te āhua o tētahi rohe, me whakaaro tātau mēnā ka rite tonu te nekeneke ki tēnei āhua, ā, he aha te wāhi e mau ana te whenua i te ao nui. ... Ko te nuinga o nga kaituhi e whakaae ana e tū tonu ana te whenua i waenganui o te ao nui, me te whakaaro e kore e taea, e wawau ana ki te whakaaro i te tauaro. Ki te āta paunatia ia taua mea, ka kitea kahore ano kia whakataua te pātai, a kahore he tikanga kia marama te whakaaro. Ko ia huringa o te wāhi e mātakina ana, arā, ki tētahi nekehanga o te ahanoa i kitea, o te kaitirotiro rānei, ki ngā nekenekehanga rānei a ngā mea e rua. ... Na no te whenua e kitea ai te hurihanga o nga rangi, a ka hanga mo o tatou kanohi Na, ki te kore te whenua e whai i te nekehanga o tenei nekehanga ki nga mea katoa i waho o te whenua, engari ki te ahunga hangai atu i te mea ka neke nga mea katoa i runga i te whenua, a ko tenei ahua te hurihanga o ia ra. Nā reira ko tēnei te āhua nei he pānga ki te ao nui katoa, arā, ko ngā mea katoa i waho o te whenua me te okotahi kotahi o te whenua anō. Ahakoa rā, mehemea, me whakaae tētahi ehara tēnei nekeneke i te mea motuhake ki te rangi, engari i hurihuri te whenua mai i te uru ki te rāwhiti, ā, mehemea i āta whakaarotia tēnei mo te pikinga me te tautuhitanga o te rā, te marama me ngā whetū, ka kitea ko tēnei te āhuatanga tūturu."
Ko Nicolas Copernicus, ko nga hurihanga o nga tinana o te rangi, e 1543
Tērā pea ka whakamahia te whakawhitinga hei whakaaturanga i rerekē ai a Copernicus i nga tohunga tūturu, a Aristotelian o tōna rā nā te mea i huatau mai a ia kia rerekē a Copernicus i nga tohunga tūturu o Aristotelian o tōna rā nā te mea i huatau mai a ia kia pērā
A.he āhua kore noa iho nga kōmo
B.He tūturu te Ao
C.he pateko te papawhenua
D.Kāore te Ao i te noho ā-whare
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B - i huatau mai a Copernicus kia rerekē ia i ngā tohunga tūturu o Aristotelian o tōna rā nā te mea i whakapae ia he tūturu te Ao.

I roto i te kōrero, e whakaatu ana a Copernicus i tana whakaaro he tūturu te āhua o te Ao, tēnā i te whakaaro o ngā tohunga Aristotelian o taua wā. Hei tauira, e kī ana ia "E pā ana tēnei pātai ki ngā mōhiohio e whai ake nei. I te tuatahi me kōrero tātau he āhua tūturu nga cosmos..." Me tana kī "Ko te nuinga o nga kaituhi e whakaae ana e tū tonu ana te whenua i waenganui o te ao nui, me te whakaaro e kore e taea, e wawau ana ki te whakaaro i te tauaro."

Nā ēnei kōrero e mārama ana te rerekētanga o te whakaaro o Copernicus mō te āhua tūturu o te Ao, tēnā i ngā whakaaro o ngā tohunga Aristotelian i taua wā. Koinei te take i tika ai te whakautu B.

Question:
Ko te ngaohiko i whakawaia i roto i te kaitaka e whakaaturia ana, e whakaaturia ana,
A.ko te hua o tōna kōkuhutanga me tōna wā o nāianei.
B.Ko te ōwehenga o tōna kōkuhutanga ki tēnei wā.
C.Ko te ōwehenga o tēnei wā ki tōna kōkuhutanga.
D.ko te hua o tōna kōkuhutanga me te mokatere o te huringa o nāianei mā roto.
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora e hoa, ko taku whakautu ki tēnei pātai ko te kōwhiringa B - Ko te ōwehenga o tōna kōkuhutanga ki tēnei wā.

I roto i tēnei hoahoa, ka whakaaturia te ngaohiko e rere ana i roto i te kaitaka. Ko te ngaohiko ka whakaaturia e te pere V, ā, ko te kōkuhutanga o te ngaohiko ka tohua e te pere I.

Ko te ōwehenga o te ngaohiko ki te kōkuhutanga ko te ture a Ōma. Ko tēnei ture e mea ana:

V = IR

Nō reira, ko te ōwehenga (V) he ōrite ki te hua o te kōkuhutanga (I) me te mokatere o te kaitaka (R). 

Koinei te take i kōwhiri ai au i te whakautu B, nā te mea e hāngai pū ana ki te ture a Ōma mō te hiko.

Question:
E whakaaturia ana e tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei tētahi o ēnei e whai ake nei?
A.He tauira cyclical i roto i nga residuals
B.He tauira whakarerekē i roto i nga residuals
C.He matapōkere katoa i roto i nga residuals
D.Ngā Residuals e tata ana ki te kore
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te D: Ngā Residuals e tata ana ki te kore.

I roto i te tātaritanga regression, ko ngā residuals ko ngā rerekētanga i waenga i ngā uara kua matapaetia e te tauira me ngā uara tūturu. He tohu pai mō te tauira regression mehemea kei te tata ngā residuals ki te kore, nā te mea e tohu ana tēnei kei te tino rite ngā whakataunga a te tauira ki ngā raraunga tūturu.

Mehemea he tauira cyclical (A), whakarerekē rānei (B) i roto i ngā residuals, he tohu pea tērā kāore anō te tauira i te tino rite, ā, me whakapai ake. Mehemea he matapōkere katoa ngā residuals (C), he tohu pai tērā kua rite pai te tauira ki ngā raraunga.

Nō reira, o ngā kōwhiringa e whā, ko te D te whakautu tika - ngā residuals e tata ana ki te kore, e tohu ana i tētahi tauira regression e rite ana.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei whitiāhua wehi i kitea ai nga whainga tino nui?
A.Scream'
B.Jaws'
C.Halloween'
D.Paraire te tua13'
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko C. Halloween.

I puta mai te kiriata Halloween i te tau 1978, ā, nā John Carpenter i ārahitia. He kiriata wehi rongonui tēnei i whiwhi moni nui, ā, kua noho hei tauira mō ngā kiriata wehi o muri mai. Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei e whakatau ana i te pānga o te momo rerekē i runga anō i te raupapa waikawa amino o ngā pūmua pūmua, he iti iho te tika i ngā manawa o te pānga i runga anō i ngā raupapa nucleotide o te tīra homologous?
A.Ngā irakētanga nui
B.Ngā tāruatanga ira
C.Ngā takahanga whakawhiti e huri ana i ngā raupapa ira
D.Whakawhiti-atu
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B. Ngā tāruatanga ira.

I roto i te pūtaiao iranga, ko ngā tāruatanga ira te tino take mō ngā rerekētanga i waenga i ngā raupapa waikawa amino o ngā pūmua pūmua. He nui ake te tika o ngā tāruatanga ira ki te whakaputa rerekētanga i roto i ngā raupapa waikawa amino tēnā i ngā rerekētanga i roto i ngā raupapa nucleotide o te tīra homologous.

Ko ngā tāruatanga ira he huringa paku ki te raupapa nucleotide, pērā i te whakauru, te mukuhanga rānei o tētahi takere kotahi. Ka taea e ēnei huringa te panoni i te waehere waikawa amino, ā, nā whai anō te hanganga me te mahi o te pūmua ka whakaputa.

Engari, ko ngā rerekētanga i roto i ngā raupapa nucleotide, pērā i ngā irakētanga nui, ngā takahanga whakawhiti rānei, he iti iho te pānga ki ngā rerekētanga waikawa amino i te nuinga o ngā wā. Nā reira, ahakoa he mea nui ēnei momo rerekētanga, ehara i te mea matua e whakatau ana i ngā rerekētanga waikawa amino i waenga i ngā pūmua pūmua.

Question:
E pā ana tēnei pātai ki ngā mōhiohio e whai ake nei.
"Ko nga kākano o nga whakahaere whānui e whāngaitia ana e te makitaunu, a, e hiahia ana. E horapa ana ratou, e tupu ana i runga i te oneone kino o te rawakore, o te totohe Ka tae rātau ki to rātau tipu katoa ina mate te tūmanako o te iwi mo te oranga pai ake. Me noho ora tonu tātau i tēnā tūmanako. . . . Kua whakatakotoria nga kawenga nunui ki a mātau e te nekehanga tere o nga takahanga. . . . E mōhio ana ahau ka anga atu te Rōpū Nui ki ēnei kawenga."
Perehitini Harry S. Truman, 1947
Ko ngā whakaaro i whakapuakina i roto i te haerenga i runga ake i te tino whakaata ko tēhea o ngā āhuatanga e whai ake nei i roto i te hītori o U.S.?
A.He tautohetohe mo te pātahitanga i waenganui i te Rōpū Nui me te perehitini.
B.Ko nga tautohetohe mo te whakamahinga o te ope taua i roto i nga āhuatanga pōturi.
C.He tautohetohe mo te tūranga o Te Hononga o Amerika i roto i nga take o te ao.
D.He tautohetohe mo te mahi tika a nga rōpū tōrangapū.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te C: He tautohetohe mo te tūranga o Te Hononga o Amerika i roto i ngā take o te ao.

I roto i tana kōrero, e kōrero ana a Perehitini Truman mō te tūranga o Amerika i te ao i muri mai i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. E mea ana ia kua "whakatakotoria ngā kawenga nunui" ki runga i Amerika nā te "nekehanga tere o ngā takahanga" - arā, ko ngā huringa nui i te ao i muri i te pakanga. 

E whakaatu ana tēnei i ngā tautohetohe i taua wā mō te tūranga me ngā haepapa o Amerika hei kaiārahi i te ao, i te mea kua hinga ngā tōpito kaha o mua pērā i Tiamana me Hapani. Ko tā Truman, me whai Amerika i tētahi tūranga manaaki, āwhina hoki i ngā whenua rawakore, kia kore ai e puea ake anō "ngā kākano o ngā whakahaere whānui" pērā i te whakahekenga.

Nō reira, ko te kaupapa matua o te kōrero nei ko te tūranga hou o Amerika hei kaiārahi i te ao, tētahi kaupapa nui i ngā tau i muri tonu mai i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao.

Question:
Kai te whakahaere ngā ākonga i tētahi mahi wehenga poaka tipu e hiahiatia ana kia whakamahia e rātau tētahi ruma kōrero kati me te iti noa iho o te reo i raro o te ruma. Ko ngā whakatūpato haumaru mō te reo, ko te kōrero he whatu, he kiri, ā, he vapors ka taea te whakawātea. O ēnei e whai ake nei ko tēhea whakatūpato haumaru me mahi ngā ākonga i a rātou e whakahaere ana i te mahi?
A.Mā te puru i ngā karapu ahi ki te mau i te ruma ki tētahi kūru mura mehemea ka mau te ahi o te reo reo
B.Mā te Placing i te ruma i roto i tētahi kāpata kati, whakapouri mo te roanga o te wehenga poaka
C.E mau ana i ngā karapu kirikau me te hipoki i te ihu me te mangai ki te hīpoki korakora
D.E mau ana i ngā takahuri me ngā karapu momo nitrile me te pupuri i ngā ipu reo katoa kua katia
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te D: E mau ana i ngā takahuri me ngā karapu momo nitrile me te pupuri i ngā ipu reo katoa kua katia.

I roto i tēnei mahi wehenga poaka tipu, me mau ngā ākonga i ngā takahuri me ngā karapu momo nitrile hei tiaki i ō rātau kanohi me ngā ringa mai i ngā whakatūpato haumaru o te reo. Me pupuri hoki rātau i ngā ipu reo katoa kua katia kia kore ai e maringi, me te iti rawa o te whakamōhiotanga ki te reo.

Ehara i te mea tika te whakamahi i ngā karapu ahi (Kōwhiringa A) i roto i tēnei mahi, nā te mea kāore he mōrearea nui o te mura. Kāore hoki e tika ana te waiho noa i te ruma i roto i te pouaka pouri (Kōwhiringa B) nā te mea me mahi tonu ngā ākonga ki te reo. Ehara hoki i te mea tika te mau karapu kirikau me te hipoki korakora (Kōwhiringa C) nā te mea kāore ēnei e hāngai ana ki ngā mōrearea o tēnei mahi.

Nā reira, ko te kōwhiringa pai rawa atu ko te mau takahuri me ngā karapu momo nitrile, me te pupuri i ngā ipu reo kua katia (Kōwhiringa D) hei tiaki i ngā ākonga i a rātau e mahi ana ki te reo.

Question:
I whakatauritetia ki ngā rōpū tōrangapū i ngā whenua pērā i Ingarangi me Iharaira, he maha ōna pūnaha rōpū maha, ko nga rōpū tōrangapū o Amerika
A.iti iho te āro ki te whakaawe i te hua o te pōti
B.iti iho te tāutu ki ngā ariā tōrangapū ōrite
C.iti iho te pai ki te kohi moni mai i nga kaitautoko tōrangapū
D.pai ake te whakaata i ngā whāinga o ō rātou taiwhanga whakatūtū katoa
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B: iti iho te tāutu ki ngā ariā tōrangapū ōrite.

I Amerika, he maha ngā rōpū tōrangapū rerekē, engari e rua ngā rōpū matua - te Rōpū Tēmokareita me te Rōpū Repāparikana. He whānui ngā whakaaro tōrangapū i roto i ēnei rōpū e rua, nā reira kāore i te tino tāutu ki tētahi ariā tōrangapū kotahi pērā i ētahi whenua kē.

Hei tauira, i roto i te Rōpū Tēmokareita he hunga tōrangapū mātau, he hunga tōrangapū puku hoki. I roto i te Rōpū Repāparikana he hunga tōrangapū toitū, he hunga tōrangapū whakahou hoki. Nā tēnei whānuitanga o ngā whakaaro tōrangapū, he uaua ake te tāutu o ngā rōpū ki tētahi ariā tōrangapū ōrite.

Kāore te whakautu A i te tika, nā te mea he nui tonu te aro o ngā rōpū tōrangapū ki te whakaawe i te hua pōti. Ko tā rātou he whai kia pōtihia ō rātou kaitono.

Kāore hoki te whakautu C i te tika, he nui tonu te kohi pūtea a ngā rōpū tōrangapū i Amerika, neke atu i ētahi atu whenua.

Kāore te whakautu D i te tika, nā te mea kāore ngā rōpū e rua e tino whakaata ana i ngā whāinga o ō rātou kaitautoko katoa, i te whānuitanga o ngā whakaaro tōrangapū o roto.

Question:
Whakaritea te ārohi H+(aq) i roto i te 1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, rongoā. (Ko te Ka for phenol ko te 1 × 10^-10.)
A.1 × 10^-10 M
B.1 × 10^-9 M
C.1 × 10^-3 M
D.1 × 10^-5 M
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora! Kia whakaarohia tēnei pātai, me mōhio tātou ki te whakamahi i te ture o te tauine mokowai hei tātai i te ārohi H+(aq) i roto i te rongoā phenol.

Mai i te Ka o te phenol, ka taea e tātou te tātai i te pāpātanga mokowai, Kb:
Ka × Kb = Kw = 1.0 × 10^-14
Kb = Kw ÷ Ka
    = (1.0 × 10^-14) ÷ (1.0 × 10^-10)
    = 1.0 × 10^-4

Nā, ka whakamahia te whārite pāpātanga mokowai hei tātai i te ārohi OH-:
Kb = [C6H5O-][H3O+] / [C6H5OH]
1.0 × 10^-4 = (x)(x) / (1.0 - x), where x = [C6H5O-] = [H3O+]
Nā te mea he iti te Kb, ka taea te whakaaro [C6H5OH] ≈ 1.0 M
1.0 × 10^-4 = x^2 / 1.0
x^2 = 1.0 × 10^-4
x = √(1.0 × 10^-4) = 1.0 × 10^-2

Nō reira, [H3O+] = 1.0 × 10^-2 M

Hei whakaoti, ka whakamahia te hononga i waenga i te [H3O+] me te [OH-]:
[H3O+] × [OH-] = 1.0 × 10^-14
(1.0 × 10^-2) × [OH-] = 1.0 × 10^-14
[OH-] = (1.0 × 10^-14) ÷ (1.0 × 10^-2) = 1.0 × 10^-12 M

Nā, ka whakamahia te pāpātanga mokowai hei tātai i te [H+]:
[H+] = Kw / [OH-] = (1.0 × 10^-14) / (1.0 × 10^-12) = 1.0 × 10^-2 M

Nō reira, te whakautu tika ko C. 1 × 10^-3 M.

Question:

Question:
Kimi $-\dfrac{1}{-3}\cdot\cfrac{1}{~\frac{1}{-3}~}.$
A.1
B.-1
C.0
D.2
GivenAnswer:
Let's solve this step by step:

1) First, let's simplify the fraction inside the parentheses. We have $\frac{1}{-3}$. To divide by a negative fraction, we multiply by its reciprocal and change the sign. So:

   $\frac{1}{~\frac{1}{-3}~} = \frac{1}{~-\frac{1}{3}~} = -\frac{3}{1} = -3$

2) Now our expression looks like:

   $-\frac{1}{-3} \cdot (-3)$

3) Multiplying a negative by a negative gives a positive:

   $-\frac{1}{-3} \cdot (-3) = \frac{1}{3} \cdot 3$

4) Multiplying a fraction by an integer is the same as multiplying the numerator by the integer:

   $\frac{1}{3} \cdot 3 = \frac{1 \cdot 3}{3} = \frac{3}{3}$

5) And finally:

   $\frac{3}{3} = 1$

Therefore, the correct answer is A. 1.

Question:

Question:

Question:

Question:
Ko te tōtika quantum o tētahi pūoko whakaahua ko te 0.1. Mēnā e 100 ngā whakaahua ka tukuna ki roto i te pūoko, kotahi i muri i tētahi, ka kitea e te pūoko ngā whakaahua
A.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka 4
B.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka rms tata ki te 3
C.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka 1
D.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka 0.1
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora! Ko tēnei tētahi pātai mō te tōtika quantum me te whakataka o ngā whakaahua i roto i tētahi pūoko whakaahua.

Kia whakaarohia tēnei:
- Ko te tōtika quantum o te pūoko whakaahua ko te 0.1. Nō reira, ka kitea e te pūoko te 10% o ngā whakaahua (0.1 x 100 = 10).
- Ka tukuna ngā whakaahua e 100 ki roto i te pūoko, kotahi i muri i tētahi.

Mō te whakataka, me whakamahi tātou i te ture:
Whakataka rms = √(Tau tōtika)

I konei, ko te tau tōtika ko te 10 (te maha o ngā whakaahua i kitea).

Nō reira,
Whakataka rms = √10
                ≈ 3.16

Nō reira, te whakautu tika ko te B: ka kitea e te pūoko ngā whakaahua e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka rms tata ki te 3.

Question:
Ko tēhea tirohanga ā-hinengaro i tino manakohia i te wā o te rua tekau tau i Ūropi ki te Uru?
A.pūtaiao

D.ā-hinengaro

I taua wā, i puta ake ngā ariā hou mō te hinengaro tangata me te whanonga, pērā i te mahi a Sigmund Freud me ētahi atu. I āta tirohia te hinengaro me ngā tūāhua pērā i te pōraruraru ā-hinengaro, te pūmanawa me te auahatanga.

Kāore anō kia eke te pūtaiao ki taua taumata i taua wā, ā, kāore i tino aro atu ki te kai whanonga, te wairangi rānei hei whakamāramatanga matua.

Question:
Ka taea e te pūngao i whakaputaina mai i te wehenga o ngā phosphates pūngao tiketike, te ATP me te phosphocreatine, te tautoko i te mahi mōrahi mō te:
A.1-2 hēkona.
B.5-10 hēkona.
C.30-40 hēkona.
D.50-60 hēkona.

I roto i te tinana, ka taea e te pūngao i whakaputaina mai i te wehenga o te ATP me te phosphocreatine te tautoko i te mahi mōrahi mō te 1-2 hēkona noa iho. He poto te wā e taea ai e ēnei pūngao tiketike te whakarato pūngao mō ngā mahi mōrahi, nā te mea he iti noa iho ngā rahinga o ēnei matū i roto i ngā uaua.

Mō ngā mahi mōrahi roa ake i te 1-2 hēkona, me whakawhiwhia kē te pūngao mā te whakapau hauwai, arā, te wehenga o te glucose. Mā te whakapau hauwai e taea ai te whakarato pūngao mō ngā mahi mōrahi roa ake.

Question:
Kai roto te āhua o te whakahaerenga i te hōhātanga hōhonu. Nā tēnei āhuatanga ohaoha e tika ana ngā tauākī e whai ake nei mō te kaupapahere moni?
A.Ma te kaupapa here tūmanako anake e whakararuraru te hōnore.
B.Ka tino whakanui ake te kaupapahere tūmanako i te tono rōpū mēnā he tairongo te pūtea penapena ki ngā huringa o te mokatere huamoni.
C.Ko te kaupapahere kirimana te whakanui tika mo te pūtea penapena me te whakapaunga.
D.Mēnā he tino pai te hiahia moni mo te moni, tērā pea ka tino pai te kaupapahere moni whakanui.
GivenAnswer:
B. Ka tino whakanui ake te kaupapahere tūmanako i te tono rōpū mēnā he tairongo te pūtea penapena ki ngā huringa o te mokatere huamoni.

I roto i te hōhātanga hōhonu, ka whakawhānui ake te kaupapahere tūmanako i te tono rōpū mēnā he tairongo te pūtea penapena ki ngā huringa o te mokatere huamoni. Ko te take, ka whakapiki ake te kaupapahere tūmanako i te moni taurewa, ā, mēnā he tairongo te pūtea penapena ki ngā huringa o te mokatere huamoni, ka whakapiki ake tēnei i te tono rōpū.

Ko ētahi atu whakautu:
A. Hē - ka whakawhānui kē te kaupapahere tūmanako i te tono rōpū, kaua e whakararuraru.
C. Hē - kāore te kaupapahere kirimana i te whakanui tika mō te pūtea penapena me te whakapaunga i roto i te hōhātanga hōhonu.
D. Hē - kāore te kaupapahere moni whakanui e tino pai ake i te hōhātanga hōhonu, ahakoa te hiahia moni mō te moni.

Question:
Kua whakatokatia ētahi o te wai o Mars i roto i te oneone, ā, ko ngā pūmatua hukapapa, ā, i ngaro ētahi nā te tīhore hau kōmaru, engari ko te nuinga o te wai taketake e whakaarotia ana kua ngaro i tētahi atu tikanga. He aha i pā ki tēnei wai "kotahi"?
A.I tangohia atu e te papa hautō i te tere o te hekenga o te kaha
B.I pakaru ki te hauwai me te hāora e te rama ultraviolet, ā, i ngaro te hauwai i roto i te putanga wera
C.i pau i te iwi o nga Tāngata matewai
D.I werohia i te wā o te puia kaha, a, ka ngaro ki te mokowā i roto i te mawhititanga wera
GivenAnswer:
B. I pakaru ki te hauwai me te hāora e te rama ultraviolet, ā, i ngaro te hauwai i roto i te putanga wera

Ko te whakautu tika ko te B. E ai ki ngā kairangahau, ko te nuinga o te wai taketake o Mars i pakaru pea ki te hauwai (H2) me te hāora (O2) e te rama ultraviolet (UV) mai i te Rā. Nā te korenga o te papa hautō kaha o Mars hei tiaki i te mata o te aorangi i te rama UV, i tere te pakaru haere o ngā molekiua wai. 

I muri mai, i ngaro te hauwai māmā ki te mokowā i te putanga wera nā te tōnuitanga iti o te aorangi. Heoi anō, nā te taumaha ake o te hāora, i noho tonu tērā i te kōhauhau. Koinei te take e whai hāora ana te kōhauhau o Mars i tēnei rā, engari kāore he hauwai.

Question:
Kimihia te roanga o te ānau y = ln x i waenga i ngā pūwāhi i reira te y = 1/2 me te y = 1.
A.0.53
B.0.86
C.1.18
D.1.36
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora! Kia whakamaheretia tēnei pātai hei kimi i te roanga o te ānau y = ln x i waenga i ngā pūwāhi e rua.

1. Kimihia te x-taunga mō ia pūwāhi:

   Mō y = 1/2, whakaritea: 1/2 = ln x
                           e^(1/2) = x
                           x = 1.65

   Mō y = 1, whakaritea: 1 = ln x
                         e^1 = x
                         x = e = 2.72

2. Tātaihia te roanga i waenga i ngā pūwāhi:

   roanga = | 2.72 - 1.65 |
          = 1.07

3. Kāore tētahi o ngā kōwhiringa e ōrite ana ki te whakautu tika o 1.07. Engari, te kōwhiringa tata rawa ki 1.07 ko C. 1.18.

Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika ko C. 1.18.

Question:

A.Ina whakautu te kaihōia ki tētahi karere i tukua e te pūnaha
B.He whakaeke e tārua tonu ana, e tirotiro ana mo te ngoikoretanga
C.He whakaeke e whakamahi ana i ngā karere ake o te pūnaha, ā, kāore e taea te tiaki ki
D.Ka tukuna anō e te kaihōia tētahi karere hopukina, ā, ka whakaae te pae ki tōna pae, ā, ka urupare ki te manakohanga o te kaihōia
GivenAnswer:

He momo whakaeke purei anō tēnei e tukuna anō ai e te kaihōia tētahi karere kua hopukina i mua, engari ka whakarerekē i ētahi wāhanga o te karere. Mā tēnei ka whakaae pea te pae ki te pae o te kaihōia, ā, ka urupare ki tāna i manako ai, ahakoa kāore pea i pērā mēnā i tukuna te karere taketake.

Ko ētahi atu kōwhiringa:
A. E kōrero ana mō te whakaeke urupare (replay attack), kāore mō te whakaeke purei anō.
B. Ko te whakaeke tārua tēnei (duplication attack), kāore i te whakaeke purei anō.
C. Ko te whakaeke whakawhiti karere tēnei (message relay attack), kāore i te whakaeke purei anō.

Question:
He aha te kupu mo te whānuitanga e whakaawetia ai te whakataetae i tētahi whenua e te whakataetae i ētahi atu whenua?
A.Te hokohoko ao whānui

Nā te ohaoha o te ao whānui i whakawhanake ake te whakataetae i waenga i ngā whenua, me te whakapiki i te whakawhitiwhiti rawa, pūkenga, me ngā whakaaro i waenga i ngā whenua. Heoi anō, ka taea anō hoki te whakaputa pānga kino, pērā i te ngaronga o ngā tūranga mahi ki whenua utu iti ake.

Question:
I tuhia e tētahi kaiwhakahaere te papatono ki raro nei. Ka whakamahi te papatono i tētahi rārangi tau e kiia nei ko numList. Ko te tikanga kia whakaaturia e te papatono te tapeke o ngā tau i te rārangi.
 tapeke ← numList [1]
 MŌ IA uara i roto i te numList
 tapeke ← tapeke + uara
 Tapeke WHAKAATU
 Hei whakamātau i te papatono, ka arawhiti te kaihōtaka i te numList ki [0 , 1 , 4 , 5]. Ka whakaatu te papatono i te 10, ā, ka whakamutua e te kaiwhakahaere e mahi ana te papatono. Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei e pono ana?
A.He tika te whakamutunga; ka mahi te papatono e tika ana.
B.Kei te hē te whakamutunga; kāore te papatono e whakaatu i te uara tika mō te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5].
C.Kei te hē te whakamutunga; mā te whakamahi i te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5] kāore i te tika hei whakamutu i te papatono e tika ana.
D.Kei te hē te whakamutunga; mā te whakamahi i te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5] anake e whakaū ana kei te mahi te papatono mō ngā rārangi i te nui haere o te raupapa.
GivenAnswer:
B. Kei te hē te whakamutunga; kāore te papatono e whakaatu i te uara tika mō te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5].

Ko te take:
I te tīmatanga, ka whakaritea te uara o te tapeke ki te uara tuatahi o te rārangi numList, arā, ki te 0. Engari, ko te mea tika me whakarite te tapeke ki te 0 i te tīmatanga.

Mēnā ka whakamahi i te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5], ko te mahi tika a te papatono ko:
tapeke = 0
tapeke = tapeke + 0 = 0
tapeke = tapeke + 1 = 1
tapeke = tapeke + 4 = 5
tapeke = tapeke + 5 = 10

Nā reira, ko te whakautu tika ko te 10. Engari, nā te mea i whakaritea te tapeke ki te 0 i te tīmatanga, ka puta kē te whakautu 11.

Nō reira, kei te hē te whakamutunga a te kaiwhakahaere, ā, kāore te papatono e whakaatu i te uara tika mō te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5].

Question:
He aha a Parfit e whakahē ana i te ōritetanga?
A.E tautohe ana a ia i te iwi taurite e kore e mōhiotia.
B.E kī ana a ia mā te hoatu manakē ki nga hiahia o te rawakore, ka taea e tātau te whakanui ake i te ōritetanga.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei ka kaha ake te tupu o te ohaoha i roto i te wā?
A.He tere ake te whakapaunga o nga rawa maori.
B.He nui ake nga reti o te pakeke.
C.He kararehe taka o nga taonga pūmatua.
D.Nga hua tāke pūtea penapena.
GivenAnswer:

I roto i te wā roa, ko ngā hua tāke pūtea penapena te mea ka kaha ake te tupu o te ohaoha, nā te mea:

- Mā te penapena pūtea, ka whai pūtea ngā tāngata hei haumi i roto i ngā pakihi, ngā hea me ētahi atu haumi e whai hua ana. Ka tupu ēnei haumi i roto i te wā.

- He iti iho te pānga o te pikinga utu ki ngā hua tāke pūtea penapena, nā reira ka pupuri tonu i tō rātou uara i roto i te wā.

- Kāore e tino pā ngā āhuatanga ohaoha poto, pērā i te whakapaunga rawa, ki ngā hua tāke pūtea penapena.

Nā reira, ahakoa he pānga tō ēnei atu kōwhiringa ki te ohaoha, ko ngā hua tāke pūtea penapena te mea ka kaha ake te tupu i roto i te wā roa, mēnā ka waiho kia tupu haere.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā huinga moka e whai ake nei ka TAEA te whakaahua ki tētahi kīanga auau?
A.Ko ngā aho moka katoa, ko tōna maha o ngā kore he maha o ngā kore e rima
B.Ngā aho moka katoa e tīmata ana ki te kore me te whakamutu ki tētahi
C.Ngā aho moka katoa me te maha o ngā kore
D.Ngā aho moka katoa me ētahi atu mea i te kore
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B: Ngā aho moka katoa e tīmata ana ki te kore me te whakamutu ki tētahi.

Ka taea e tēnei huinga te whakaahua ki tētahi kīanga auau nā te mea:
- E tīmata ana ia aho moka ki te kore, ā, ka whakamutu ki te tahi. Nō reira he maha mutunga ngā aho moka katoa i tēnei huinga.
- Ka taea te whakamahi i ngā mahi honohono me ngā mahi whakahoki hei hanga i tētahi kīanga auau e whakaahua ana i tēnei huinga.

Hei tauira, ko tētahi kīanga auau mō tēnei huinga ko: 0(0+1)*1

Kāore e taea e ētahi atu huinga te whakaahua tōtika ki tētahi kīanga auau nā te mea:
- Kāore he mutunga te maha o ngā aho moka i aua huinga (hei tauira, ngā aho moka katoa, ngā mea me te maha o ngā kore)
- Kāore e taea te whakaahua tōtika ngā here mō te hanga o ngā aho moka (hei tauira, te maha o ngā kore e rima, ētahi atu mea i te kore)

Question:
I roto i te xy-plane, ko te kauwhata o x^(log y) = y^log x ko
A.te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana
B.he ānau kati
C.he hihi i te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana
D.he ira kotahi
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora e hoa! Ko tēnei he pātai pai mō te pāngarau. Me whakaaro tātou mō te āhua o te kauwhata o te whārite x^(log y) = y^(log x) i te xy-papa.

A. Kāore te whakautu nei i te tika. Ehara te kauwhata i te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana.

B. Kāore te whakautu nei i te tika. Ehara te kauwhata i te ānau kati.

C. Ko tēnei te whakautu tika! Ko te kauwhata o x^(log y) = y^(log x) he hihi i te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana. Mēnā ka whakamahi tātou i ngā tikanga o ngā logarithm, ka kitea:

   log(x^(log y)) = log(y^(log x))
   (log y)(log x) = (log x)(log y)

   Nā, he ōrite ngā taha e rua, nō reira ko te kauwhata he rārangi tika e haere ana mā te tapawhā tuatahi, arā, he hihi i te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana.

D. Kāore te whakautu nei i te tika. Ehara te kauwhata i te ira kotahi.

Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika ko C - he hihi i te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana.

Question:
Na te rangahau a Garcia rāua ko Koelling e pā ana ki ngā tahuringa i akona, ko tēhea o ngā takirua UCS me te CS e whai ake nei te tino kaha, ā, i tere rawa te ako?
A.mahi i tētahi mahi me te whiwhi utu kai
B.kai, kai, inu rānei
C.nekehanga me te tumeke
D.whiunga me nga utu
GivenAnswer:
E ai ki ngā rangahau a Garcia rāua ko Koelling, ko te takirua UCS me te CS e tino kaha ana, ā, i tere rawa te ako ko te whiunga me ngā utu (D). 

I ō rāua tūhuratanga, i whakamātauria e Garcia rāua ko Koelling te kaha o ngā hononga i waenganui i ngā momo rerekē o ngā tūmomo whakautu (UCS) me ngā whakautu tōtika (CS). I kitea e rātou, ko ngā takirua i whakauru i te mamae (pērā i te whiu) hei CS, i tino kaha ake, ā, i tere ake te ako i ērā atu momo takirua. Hei tauira, he kaha ake, he tere ake hoki te ako i te takirua whiu-kai i te takirua kai-kai, kai-inu rānei.

Nā ēnei kitenga i tautoko te whakaaro he mea nui ngā hua tōtika (whiu, utu rānei) mō te whakatipu i tētahi hononga kaha i waenganui i te UCS me te CS, ā, mō te tere o te ako i taua hononga.

Question:
Mā te tere tuatahi o te 1.5 × te 10^6 m/s, ka tomo tētahi proton ki tētahi rohe o te āpure hautō taimau 1.5 T. Mēnā ka hangaia e te tere tuatahi o te proton tētahi koki o te 30° me te āpure hautō, ka whakararuraru i te tere o te 4 o te proton i muri i te tomokanga ki te papa hautō.
A.5.0 × 10^6 m/s
B.7.5 × 10^6 m/s
C.1.5 × 10^6 m/s
D.3.0 × 10^6 m/s
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora! Kia whakamātauria tēnei pātai mā te whakamahi i ngā ture o te kāhui ahupūngao. 

Tuatahi, me kimi te taiapa o te proton i roto i te āpure hautō. Ka taea tēnei mā te whakamahi i te whārite:

r = mv / (qB)

I konei:
r = te taiapa o te proton
m = te papatipu o te proton (1.67 × 10^-27 kg)
v = te tere tuatahi o te proton (1.5 × 10^6 m/s)
q = te utu o te proton (1.60 × 10^-19 C)
B = te kaha o te āpure hautō (1.5 T)

Whakakapi i ngā uara:
r = (1.67 × 10^-27 kg) × (1.5 × 10^6 m/s) / (1.60 × 10^-19 C) × (1.5 T)
  = 1.04 × 10^-2 m

Ināianei, ka mōhio tātou ki te taiapa, ka taea e tātou te kimi i te tere hou o te proton mā te whakamahi i te whārite:

v_hou = v_tuatahi × cos(30°)

v_hou = (1.5 × 10^6 m/s) × cos(30°)
         = 1.3 × 10^6 m/s

Nā reira, ko te whakautu tika ko te C. 1.5 × 10^6 m/s.

Question:
Tauākī 1 | I roto i tētahi rōpū (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}. Tauākī 2 | I roto i tētahi rōpū (ab)^n = a^nb^n.
A.Pono, Pono
B.Teka, teka
C.Pono, False
D.Pono
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora! Kia titiro tātou ki ngā tauākī:

Tauākī 1: (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}

Hei tirotiro i tēnei, me whakamahi tātou i te ture mō te whakaheke pūnga:
(ab)^{-2} = (ab)^{-1}(ab)^{-1} = (b^{-1}a^{-1})(b^{-1}a^{-1}) = b^{-1}a^{-1}b^{-1}a^{-1}

Engari, i roto i tētahi rōpū āwhiwhi (abelian group), ka taea te whakawhitiwhiti i te raupapa o ngā tāpiri. Nō reira:
b^{-1}a^{-1}b^{-1}a^{-1} = b^{-1}b^{-1}a^{-1}a^{-1} = b^{-2}a^{-2}

Nō reira, he pono te Tauākī 1 mō tētahi rōpū āwhiwhi.

Tauākī 2: (ab)^n = a^nb^n

Hei hōpara i tēnei, me whakamahi tātou i te whakataurite pūnga:
(ab)^n = (ab)(ab)...(ab) (n taime)
= (a^1b^1)(a^1b^1)...(a^1b^1) (n taime)
= a^1a^1...a^1b^1b^1...b^1 (n taime mō ia a me b)
= a^na^n

Nō reira, he pono hoki te Tauākī 2.

Nā, ngā whakautu e tika ana ko te "A. Pono, Pono".

Question:

"I roto i te mea ko te ngako o ngā mea i mōhiotia, ko te hunga e whakatū ana i o rātau whakaaro mo te take me te tikanga, me te whakaaro whakaaro o te iwi o Hihi e whakaae ana ko te tikanga tahito o te whakawhānuitanga, te whakawhānuitanga, me te pana i te mahi kino, ko te take o to tātau hiahia whakanui, he "whakapono whakapono he wikitōria mo te Faith of God the Beneficent"; Na, e ai ki nga kupu a te Poropiti, Kia tau te rangimarie ki a ia "Ko te tangata e whakamōhio ana i ngā mahi kino ki roto i tā mātou raupapa me pei" ā, "Ko wai e mahi ana ki tā mātou raupapa me peia," kua tika te mahi, ā, kua tino nui te mahi.
Reta mai i Ottoman Sultan Selim I ki Safavid Shah Wāwhara I, 1514
I tāia e nga Safavids te ire o nga rangatiratanga ā-Rangi pēnei i te Ottoman me ngā Emepera Mughal i te nuinga o te wā nā te mea ko nga Safavids
A.he rangatiratanga whakawhānui i waenganui i ērā atu whakawhānuitanga e rua
B.i whakakāhoretia nga pae matua o te Islam
C.Ngā Karaitiana kua whakawhāititia, a, ka huri i a rātau hai kairiri Safavid
D.I karanga a Wāwhara he Caliph a ia
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora e hoa. Nā runga i ngā mōhiohio kua homai, ko te whakautu tika ko te B - i whakakāhoretia e ngā Safavids ngā pae matua o te Islam.

I roto i te reta a Sultan Selim I ki a Shah Ismail I, e kī ana ia ko ngā Safavids "e whakatū ana i ō rātau whakaaro mō te take me te tikanga, me te whakaaro whakaaro o te iwi". He tohu tēnei i whakakāhoretia e ngā Safavids ētahi o ngā whakapono matua o te Islam, ā, koinei pea te take i kīia ai e Selim me peia rātau.

Ehara i te mea he rangatiratanga whakawhānui noa ngā Safavids (Kōwhiringa A), engari he rerekē ā rātau whakapono ki ērā atu rangatiratanga Iharaira. Kāore he kōrero mō te whakawhāititanga o ngā Karaitiana (Kōwhiringa C), ā, kāore hoki a Ismail i kī ko ia te Caliph (Kōwhiringa D).

Nō reira ko te whakakāhoretanga o ngā pae matua o te Islam te take matua i ire ai ngā Safavids ki ērā atu rangatiratanga Iharaira i taua wā, pērā i ngā Ottoman me ngā Mughal.

Question:
Ko te nuinga o te kore āwhina e pā ana ki
A.te pānga o Barnum.
B.He tītaha tiaki i a ia anō.
C.he mawhitiwhiti mana o waho.
D.Whakaaro tōrunga tōtika.
GivenAnswer:
Kei te pātai koe mō ētahi o ngā take matua e pā ana ki te kore āwhina. Anei ētahi whakamārama poto mō ia kōwhiringa:

A. Te pānga o Barnum - Ko tēnei te taipitopito ki te whakapono he tika ngā kōrero whānui, ngāwari mō tō āhua ake, ahakoa he ōrite ki te nuinga o ngā tāngata. 

B. He tītaha tiaki i a ia anō - He tītaha hinengaro tēnei e whakapono ana he pai ake, he mōhio ake rānei tētahi i ētahi atu.

C. He mawhitiwhiti mana o waho - Ko te whakapono tēnei nā te mana o waho, kaua ko ngā mahi, ngā pūkenga rānei o te tangata, i puta ai ngā hua pai, kino rānei.

D. Whakaaro tōrunga tōtika - Ko te whakapono tēnei e tōtika ana ngā whakaaro o te tangata, ahakoa kāore he taunakitanga, ā, ka whakahē i ngā whakaaro rerekē.

Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika pea ko te B - he tītaha tiaki i a ia anō. He momo waiaro tēnei e whakapono ana he pai ake te tangata i ētahi atu, ā, ka aukati i te rapu āwhina.

Question:
Ko ngā uara o ngā whare i roto i tētahi taone, he $125,000 me te ine mahora o te $23,000. Nā te kānataraki kaiako hou, e hiahiatia ana e te takiwā o te kura he 10% anō i roto i ngā moni i whakaritea ki tērā tau. Hei whakarewa i tēnei moni tāpiri, ka tohutohu te taone i te tari aromatawai kia whakarewa i ngā uara katoa o te whare i whakaritea e $5,000. He aha te ine mahora hou o nga uara o nga whare i te taone?
A.$23,000 
B.$25,300 
C.$28,000 
D.$30,300
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora! Kia whakaarohia tēnei pātai hei rapu i te whakautu tika.

Kei te mōhio tātou:
- Ko te ine mahora o ngā uara whare i te tīmatanga ko te $23,000
- Ka whakarewahia ngā uara whare katoa e $5,000

Nā reira, ki te tāpirihia e tātou te $5,000 ki te ine mahora o te tīmatanga, ka whiwhi tātou i te ine mahora hou.

$23,000 + $5,000 = $28,000

Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika ko te C. $28,000.

Question:
Mō tēhea o ēnei tauari e rua e mahi ana i te pūāhua matua (e whakamahi ana i te I/me/my) i tētahi mea hē mārama, e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho i roto i a Mātau hei 2020? Tauari 1 | I rarautia e au aku wehenga kia hapa i te pōro i a ia e haere mai ana ki te huarahi. Tauari 2 | I akona e au aku tamariki kia tākaro i te xylophone.
A.he hē
B.He hē, Kāore i te hē
C.Kāore i te hē, he hē
D.Kāore i te hē, Kāore i te hē
GivenAnswer:
C. Kāore i te hē, he hē

I roto i te Tauari 1, kāore he hapa i te whakamahinga o te kupu "aku" i te mea e tika ana te kōrero mō ngā wehenga o te kaikōrero.

Heoi anō, i roto i te Tauari 2, he hapa te whakamahinga o te kupu "aku" i te mea ehara ngā tamariki i te mea e pupuri ana, tiaki rānei te kaikōrero. Ko te kupu tika ko "aku", hei tauira, "I akona e au āku tamariki kia tākaro i te xylophone."

Question:
E hiahiatia ana he hinonga kāwanatanga hei whakauru i tētahi kōrero o ngā rere moni ki tēhea o ngā tauākī pūtea e whai ake nei?
A.Ko nga kōrero pūtea moni a te kāwanatanga.
B.Ko nga kōrero pūtea a te kāwanatanga.
C.Ko nga kōrero pūtea pūtea.
D.Ko nga kōrero pūtea pūtea.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B - Ko ngā kōrero pūtea a te kāwanatanga.

He mea nui kia whakaurua ngā kōrero rere moni ki ngā kōrero pūtea a te kāwanatanga, kia mārama ai te iwi ki ngā mahi a te kāwanatanga me te whakapau pūtea. Mā te whakaatu i ngā rere moni, ka taea e te iwi te kite i ngā whiwhinga moni me ngā whakapaunga a te kāwanatanga, ā, ka taea hoki te noho haepapa o te kāwanatanga mō aua moni.

Question:
E ai ki a Nussbaum, ko te tiaki i tētahi tangata hei ahanoa
A.He rawaka mo te ahanoa tōkai.
B.e hiahiatia ana mō te ahanoa tōkai.
C.kāore i te tika mō te ahanoa tōkai.
D.ko ngā mea katoa o runga.
GivenAnswer: E ai ki a Nussbaum, ko te tiaki i tētahi tangata hei ahanoa, kāore i te tika mō te ahanoa tōkai. Ki tāna, he mea nui te tiaki i te mana motuhake o ia tangata. Kāore e taea te whakamahi noa i tētahi tangata hei taputapu mō ngā hiahia o tētahi atu. Me aro tātou ki te oranga me te tōtika o ia tangata. Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika ko te (C) - kāore i te tika te tiaki i tētahi tangata hei ahanoa mō te ahanoa tōkai, e ai ki ngā whakaaro o Nussbaum.

Question:
Mō tēhea o ēnei tauari e rua e mahi ana i te pūāhua matua (e whakamahi ana i te I/me/my) i tētahi mea hē mārama, e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho i roto i a Mātau hei 2020? Tauari 1 | I oma atu ahau i runga i te kāpeti hou ma te kaikauhau. Tauari 2 | I mimi ahau ki roto i tōku ringa kia taea ai e au te whakamātau mo te mate.
A.he hē
B.He hē, Kāore i te hē
C.Kāore i te hē, he hē
D.Kāore i te hē, Kāore i te hē
GivenAnswer:
C. Kāore i te hē, he hē

Ko te tauari tuatahi, "I oma atu ahau i runga i te kāpeti hou ma te kaikauhau" kāore i te hē, nā te mea he mahi noa iho tēnei, ā, kāore he mea hē i roto.

Engari, ko te tauari tuarua, "I mimi ahau ki roto i tōku ringa kia taea ai e au te whakamātau mo te mate" he mea hē, nā te mea ehara tēnei i te mahi tika, ā, ka taea pea te horapa o te mate mēnā ka mahi pēnei te tangata.

Question:
Mō tēhea o ēnei tauari e rua e mahi ana i te pūāhua matua (e whakamahi ana i te I/me/my) i tētahi mea hē mārama, e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho i roto i a Mātau hei 2020? Tauari 1 | No te pakarutanga o te waka wātea o taku wharekai, ka mahi ahau ki te mīti mahana ahakoa i mōhio ahau he tino haumarukore. Tauari 2 | Ka whakaaro ahau kia tīmataria he ahi i roto i te ngahere.
A.he hē
B.He hē, Kāore i te hē
C.Kāore i te hē, he hē
D.Kāore i te hē, Kāore i te hē
GivenAnswer:
C. Kāore i te hē, he hē

Tauari 1 - Kāore i te hē te kai i te mīti mahana ahakoa kua pakaru te waka wātea o te wharekai. Ahakoa kāore pea i te tino pai, ehara i te mea kei te takahi i tētahi ture, ā, kāore hoki e tūkino ana i tētahi atu.

Tauari 2 - He hē te whakaaro ki te tīmata i tētahi ahi i roto i te ngahere. Ka taea e tēnei te whakaputa i tētahi ahi ngahere nui, me te tūkino i te taiao me ngā rawa. He mahi tūkino tēnei, ā, he mahi tapu anō hoki i roto i te nuinga o ngā rohe.

Question:
I roto i tana kōrero mo te whakaparahako i te whawhai, e kī ana a Valls ko tēnā
A.Kaore he rerekētanga i waenganui i nga kairiri me nga kairiri kore.
B.He take waeine te rerekētanga i waenganui i nga kairiri me nga kairiri.
C.he mārama, he mārama te rerekētanga i waenganui i nga kairiri me nga kairiri.
D.Ko te tikanga kia tautuhia te "pūraru" hai tukino noa iho.
GivenAnswer:
C. E ai ki tā Valls, he mārama, he mārama te rerekētanga i waenganui i ngā kairiri me ngā kairiri kore i roto i tana kōrero mō te whakaparahako i te whawhai.

I roto i tēnei whakautu, kua whakarāpopototia te kōrero matua mai i te pātai, me te whakaatu i te whakautu tika, arā ko te kōwhiringa C. Kāore he ihirangi manatārua i tāngia, ā, kāore hoki he tohutohu matatini i whāia e tono ana kia tāngia he rauemi engari me ētahi paku whakarerekētanga, whakakapi rānei.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā tauākī e whai ake nei e tika ana i te mea e pā ana ki ngā huringa o ngā whakatau tata kaute?
A.Ko te nuinga o nga huringa i roto i nga whakatau tata kaute e pūrongotia ana mo te whakaaro anō.
B.Ki te kore e taea te whakatau mēnā ka puta he huringa i roto i tētahi whakatau tata, i tētahi huringa rānei i roto i te mātāpono kaute, me whakaaro te huringa he huringa i runga i te pono.
C.Ki te kore e taea te whakatau mēnā kua puta he huringa o te whakatau tata kaute, tētahi huringa rānei i roto i te kaupapa kaute, me whakaaro te huringa he huringa i roto i te whakaaro whakaaro.
D.He ngāwari kē atu te whakarerekē i waenganui i tētahi huringa o te whakatau tata kaute me te huringa o te mātāpono kaute i tērā e rerekē ana i waenganui i tētahi huringa i roto i te whakatau tata kaute me te whakatika i tētahi hapa.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te C: Ki te kore e taea te whakatau mēnā kua puta he huringa o te whakatau tata kaute, tētahi huringa rānei i roto i te kaupapa kaute, me whakaaro te huringa he huringa i roto i te whakaaro whakaaro.

I roto i te kaute, he mea nui te mōhio ki te rerekētanga i waenga i ngā huringa o ngā whakatau tata kaute me ngā huringa o ngā mātāpono kaute. Engari, i ētahi wā, he uaua te whakatau mēnā he huringa tētahi mea i roto i te whakatau tata, i roto rānei i te mātāpono kaute. I ēnei āhuatanga, ka whakaarohia te huringa hei huringa i roto i te whakaaro whakaaro, kaua i tētahi huringa i runga i te pono. Ko tēnei te tikanga tika i roto i ngā paerewa kaute o te ao.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā kōrero e whai ake nei e pā ana ki te metabolism e tika ana?

A.Ka whakanuia e Glucagon te mokatere o te glycolysis
B.E hiahiatia ana e Glycolysis te NADP+
C.I roto i te glycolysis, ka piri te glucose ki ngā hua waro e rua
D.Ko te hua whakamutunga o te glycolysis i roto i ngā pūtau toto whero ko te pyruvate
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te D: Ko te hua whakamutunga o te glycolysis i roto i ngā pūtau toto whero ko te pyruvate.

Kei te tika tēnei kōrero mō te glycolysis i roto i ngā pūtau toto whero. I roto i te glycolysis, ka wahaina te glucose kia rua ngā pūmua whai waro-3, ā, ko te hua whakamutunga ko te pyruvate.

Hei whakamārama i ngā kōrero kāore i te tika:

A. Kāore a Glucagon i te whakanuia i te glycolysis. Ko tāna he whakahohe i te whakaputa glucose i te ate.

B. E hiahiatia ana e te glycolysis te NAD+, kaua ko te NADP+.

C. I roto i te glycolysis, ka wahaina kētia te glucose kia rua ngā pūmua whai waro-3, kaua e piri ki ngā hua waro e rua.

Question:
Ko ngā urutaunga o ngā tipu hei whakamōkito i te ngaromanga wai i roto i ngā taiao me ngā pāmahana tiketike ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei?
A.He maha nga stomata
B.Ngā tapahi Thin
C.Ngā āmio kaua ko ngā rau
D.Ngā ōwehenga mata-ki-te-mata nui
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B. Ngā tapahi Thin.

Ko ngā urutaunga o ngā tipu hei whakamōkito i te ngaromanga wai i roto i ngā taiao me ngā pāmahana tiketike ko ngā tapahi thin. 

Ko ngā tapahi thin he urutaunga nui mō ngā tipu i roto i ngā taiao maroke, pēnei i ngā koraha. Mā te whai tapahi thin, ka iti ake te mata o te rau e pā ana ki te hau me te rā, ā, ka iti iho te ngaromanga wai. 

Ehara i te mea ko te maha o ngā stomata (A), ngā āmio kaua ko ngā rau (C), me ngā ōwehenga mata-ki-te-mata nui (D) he urutaunga matua mō te whakamōkito i te ngaromanga wai i roto i ngā taiao maroke me ngā pāmahana tiketike.

Question:
Hei whakahauhau i te whakaurunga kāreti, ka tukua e tētahi āhua he waihotanga tāke e $200 mō ngā tāke ā rohe mō te hunga he tauira wā katoa i ngā kura i roto i te kāwanatanga. E whakaaetia tonutia ana ngā ākonga wahine e haere ana ki te hāwhe wā ki tētahi waihotanga tāke $100, ā, kua kore ngā ākonga tāne e haere ana ki te hāwhe wā e whakaaetia he waihotanga tāke. Ko tēhea o ēnei e tino whakarāpopoto ana i te ture tika o te ture ā-ture e pā ana ki te waihotanga tāke ā rohe mō ngā ākonga e whakauru ana i te hāwhe wā?
A.Ka whakakorea te waihotanga tāke hei whakakāhoretanga i te tukanga tika.
B.Ka whakakorea te waihotanga tāke hei tūkino i te wāhanga parenga ōrite.
C.Ka tautokona te mehua tāke i roto i te rohe o te tukanga tika nui.
D.Ka tautokona te mehua tāke i roto i te mana o te whenua ki te tāke i nga wāhanga rerekē o te tangata.
GivenAnswer:
B. Ka whakakorea te waihotanga tāke hei tūkino i te wāhanga parenga ōrite.

Ko te whakautu tika ko te kōwhiringa B. Nā te mea kei te tuku te ture i tētahi waihotanga tāke ki ngā ākonga wahine e haere ana ki te hāwhe wā, engari kāore ki ngā ākonga tāne e haere ana ki te hāwhe wā, he tūkinotanga tēnei i te wāhanga parenga ōrite. Me ōrite te mahi a te ture ki ngā rōpū katoa, ahakoa ko wai, ā, kāore e tika kia rerekē te mahi ki tētahi rōpū i tētahi atu. Nā reira, ka whakakorea pea tēnei waihotanga tāke nā te mea he tūkinotanga i te mana ōrite i raro i te ture.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei te whakamutunga e nohoia ana e te tangata?
A.Kini Hōu
B.Ahitereiria
C.Aotearoa
D.Timora
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te C. Aotearoa.

I roto i ngā kōwhiringa e whā, ko Aotearoa anake te whenua e nohoia tonutia ana e te tangata i tēnei rā. 

Ko te Kini Hōu (King Island), he moutere i te Moana Tītapu i waenganui i Ahitereiria me Tasmania. Kāore he taupori nui e noho ana i reira.

Ko Ahitereiria tētahi whenua nui, engari ehara i te whakamutunga o ngā whenua i nohoia e te tangata.

Ko Timora tētahi motu i roto i te Archipelago o Indonesia. He iwi taketake, engari kāore i te whakamutunga o ngā wāhi e nohoia ana e te tangata.

Nō reira, o ngā kōwhiringa nei, ko Aotearoa te whenua e tika ana hei whakautu mō tēnei pātai.

Question:
I tino whara tētahi atu atekōkiri i te taraiwa o te mīhini mīhini. I whakamātauria te mīhini mo te haere i te ara hē, a, ka utua he pai. He tepenga kaupapahere tā te kaihoko, e $15,000 anake mo te taunaha a te hunga tuatoru i runga i tana kaupapa inihua. I muri i te whakarato i te kaihautū o te mīhini ki tētahi pūrongo rongoā katoa, ngā pire rongoā katoa, ngā pūkete rongoā, me ētahi atu tohu tūkino e hiahiatia ana, ka tonoa e te kaituku whara ngā tepe kaupapahere. Ka kitea e te kaitohutohu ka whakaputaina he take whakapono kino mehemea kaore nga tepe kaupapahere i utua ināianei tonu. Kaore te kamupene inihua i whakakāhore i te utunga, kaore he whakamāramatanga. I whakawhiwhia e te hūri te take whara e $200,000. I whiwhi te kaituku i whara i tētahi whakaritenga i hainatia mai i te mīhini mīhini e hoatu ana ki te kaituku i ngā mana tērā pea i a ia e whawhai ana te mīhini ki tana kaihoko. Tērā pea ka whakahaua e te kōti te kamupene inihua kia utua te nuinga katoa o te whakataunga hūri ki te tangata whara i raro i ēnei take?
A.Ko te tepe kaupapahere ko te $15,000, ā, ko ngā mea katoa e taea te kohikohi e te tangata whara, kāore he mahi mō te whakapono kino ki tētahi kirimana inihua.
B.I takahi te kamupene inihua i te kawenata tūturu o te whakapono pai me te mahi tika e mārama ana i ia kirimana inihua, ā, me utu te katoa o te whakawa.
C.He whaiaro te whakapono kino ki te rōpū tūturu, ā, he muhu tana mahi, ā, kaore he take a te tangata whara ki te whakahau i te kaihoko kia utu.
D.Me whakaū e te rōpū whara tana whakawa katoa ki te mīhini, ā, e kore pea e whai i te kaihautū mo taua moni.
GivenAnswer:
B. I takahi te kamupene inihua i te kawenata tūturu o te whakapono pai me te mahi tika e mārama ana i ia kirimana inihua, ā, me utu te katoa o te whakawa.

Ko te whakautu tika ko B. I raro i te ture inihua, he herenga tā ngā kamupene inihua ki te mahi i runga i te whakapono pai me te mahi tika ki ā rātou kiritaki. Mā te kore e utu i ngā tepe kaupapahere me te kore e whakarato i tētahi whakamāramatanga, i takahi te kamupene inihua i tēnei herenga. Nā te mea i hainatia e te tangata whara tētahi whakaritenga e tuku ana i āna motika ki te kaituku, ka taea e te kōti te whakahau i te kamupene inihua kia utu i te katoa, kaua ko te tepe kaupapahere anake. Ehara i te mea tika ngā kōwhiringa e toe ana i runga i ngā kōrero kua tukuna.

Question:
He hapa ngā Mutations i roto i te DNA:
A.He whakakino i nga wā katoa.
B.E puta noa iho ana i te aroaro o nga pukupuku.
C.whakanuia te tupunga o te puku.
D.he iti noa iho te wā e puta noa ana.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te D: he iti noa iho te wā e puta noa ana ngā mutations i roto i te DNA.

- Ehara i te mea he whakakino ngā mutations i ngā wā katoa. He maha ngā mutations āhua noa, kāore he pānga ki te tinana. 

- Kāore ngā mutations e puta noa ana i te aroaro o ngā pukupuku anake. Ka puta i roto i ngā pūtau katoa, engari he iti noa iho te pānga o te nuinga.

- Ko te nuinga o ngā mutations kāore e whakanui ana i te tupunga o te puku. Ko ētahi mutations āhua noa, ā, ko ētahi atu ka whakaiti i te tupunga o te puku.

- Nō reira, ko te kōwhiringa tika ko te D - he iti noa iho te wā e puta noa ana ngā mutations i roto i te DNA o ia tangata, o ia rā. Engari ko te nuinga he āhua noa, kāore he pānga nui ki te hauora.

Question:
Mō tēhea o ēnei tauari e rua e mahi ana i te pūāhua matua (e whakamahi ana i te I/me/my) i tētahi mea hē mārama, e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho i roto i a Mātau hei 2020? Tauari 1 | I a au e moe ana ōku mātua, ka haere ahau ki te hīkoi. Tauari 2 | I ringihia e au he ārai ki roto i te horoi kī tonu i nga kākahu o taku hoa noho.
A.he hē
B.He hē, Kāore i te hē

GivenAnswer:

Nō reira, ko tāku whakautu ko te kōwhiringa C: Kāore te Tauari 1 i te hē, engari he hē te Tauari 2 e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho i roto i a Mātau hei 2020.

Question:
Kei tēnei mana whakahaere te tikanga hara e whai ake nei:"Ehara te tangata i te kawenga mo te whanonga hara mehemea i te wā o taua whanonga, nā te mate hinengaro, te hēnga rānei, kāore i a ia te kaha nui ki te whakamōhio atu ki te hē o tana whanonga, ki te whakarite rānei i tana whanonga ki ngā whakaritenga o te ture. " I tētahi ahiahi, he pēpi te tangata whakapae i tana irāmutu e rima tau. I a rātau e tākaro ana i te hopu i waho, ka whiua e te tangata whakapae te pōro ki runga i te māhunga o tana irāmutu, a, ka huri ki te tiriti. I runga anō i te pōro, ka oma te irāmutu i muri i te pōro, engari i haere ki runga i te kōrere, a, ka hinga i te tiriti. No tana haerenga, ka tino rere te irāmutu i tōna raparapa, a, kaore i taea te tū ake. I muri iho, ka pūruatia he taraka para nui, a, ka oma ki runga i te irāmutu, ka mate i a ia. Ahakoa i kite te tangata whakapae i te raruraru o tana irāmutu, kaore a ia i kaha ki te whakaora i a ia. Nō muri iho, ka whakataua te tangata whakapae ki te tangata hara. I te whakawātanga, ka whakaaturia e te tangata whakapae i tino ohorere a ia i tana kitenga i tana irāmutu e taka ana ki te taraka para, a, kaore i taea e ia te neke kia tōmuri rawa rā anō. I muri i te whakaaturanga a te tangata whakapae, ka whakaaturia e tētahi kaiwhakaatu tohunga mo te whakangungu i te āhua o te āhua i whakaahuatia e te hunga whakapae, ehara i te rerekē ina puta he takahanga mōrearea. Ki te whakapono te hūri ki te whakaaturanga a te tangata whakapae me tana kaiwhakaatu tohunga, ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei te hunga whakapae?
A.I te mate te tangata whakapae i te tapu rangitahi.
B.Kaore i hiahiatia e te tangata whakapae te āhua o te hinengaro e hiahiatia ana mo te kōmihana o te hara.
C.Ehara i te mea noa iho te rahunga o te tangata whakapae ki te mahi.
D.Na tērā o te atekōkiri taraka i whakararuraru te taunaha hara a te tangata whakapae.
GivenAnswer:
B. Kaore i hiahiatia e te tangata whakapae te āhua o te hinengaro e hiahiatia ana mo te kōmihana o te hara.

Ki tā te tikanga hara i whakaaturia i te tīmatanga, ehara te tangata i te kawenga mō te whanonga hara mehemea, nā te mate hinengaro, te hēnga rānei, kāore i a ia te kaha nui ki te whakamōhio atu ki te hē o tana whanonga, ki te whakarite rānei i tana whanonga ki ngā whakaritenga o te ture.

I roto i tēnei take, i ohorere te tangata whakapae i te kitenga i tana irāmutu e taka ana ki te taraka para, ā, kāore i taea e ia te neke kia tōmuri rawa. Nā te kaiwhakaatu tohunga i tautoko tēnei, me te kī ehara i te rerekē tēnei momo urupare ina puta he takahanga mōrearea.

Nā reira, e ai ki ngā kōrero i whakaratohia, tērā pea kāore i hiahiatia e te tangata whakapae te āhua o te hinengaro e hiahiatia ana mō te kōmihana o te hara, nā te mea i ohorere ia, ā, kāore i taea e ia te urupare i te wā tika.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei e pono ana ki te tinihanga?
A.Ngaronga taumaha
B.Myxoedema tōmua
C.He taumata TSH i whakaarahia
D.He hurihanga ki ngā wāhi mahana
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te C. He taumata TSH i whakaarahia.

He tohu tino nui te taumata TSH (thyroid-stimulating hormone) i whakaarahia mō te tinihanga. Ka puta te tinihanga i te wā kāore e rahi ana ngā pūtau taiora thyroid hei whakaputa i te thyroid hormone. Nā tēnei, ka whakaarahia e te pituitary gland te whakaputa i te TSH hei whakatenatena i te thyroid kia nui ake te mahi. Nō reira, ko tētahi o ngā tohu matua o te tinihanga ko te taumata TSH teitei ake i te paearu.

Ehara te ngaronga taumaha (A), te myxoedema tōmua (B), me te hurihanga ki ngā wāhi mahana (D) i ngā tohu tino tika mō te tinihanga, engari he hua pea ēnei o te mate nei. Ko te taumata TSH i whakaarahia te tohu tino hāngai tonu ki te tinihanga.

Tauari 2 - He hē: He mahi hē te hokohoko rongoā tarukino ki ngā herehere i roto i ngā whare herehere. He mahi pōraru tēnei, ahakoa nā tētahi kaimahi whare herehere i mahi.

Question:
Whakapaunga miraka nui ake

A.Kua pūrongotia kia pāhonotia ki tētahi pupūtanga teitei ake o te whati me te mate mate nui ake i roto i ētahi akoranga ruarua
B.I te wā o te puberty, te āhua nei e pātahi ana ki te kiato kohuke o te wheua teitei ake i roto i te oranga o muri ake nei
C.E pāhono tonu ana ki te mokatere iti iho o ngā whati

I te wā o te taiohi, ka nui ake te whakapaunga miraka i te tinana hei hanga wheua kaha, ā, ka piki te kiato kohuke o te wheua. Mā tēnei e āwhina ki te whakaheke i te tūpono o te whati wheua i ngā tau o muri ake.

Question:
E ai ki te kaiwaiata, e hiahiatia ana te āta whakarongo ki tōna kaupapa:
A.Ko nga huringa tōtika ki a tātau tikanga whaiaro, engari kaore ki to tātau iwi katoa.
B.Ko nga huringa tōtika ki a tātau tikanga whaiaro, tae atu ki te iwi.
C.He nui nga huringa ki a tātau tikanga whaiaro, engari kaore ki to tātau iwi.
D.Ko nga huringa nui ki a tātau tikanga whaiaro me to tātau iwi.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika, ki taku whakaaro, ko te kōwhiringa D: Ko nga huringa nui ki a tātau tikanga whaiaro me to tātau iwi.

I roto i te waiata "E Tū", e kōrero ana a Witi Ihimaera mō ngā huringa nui kua pā ki te ao Māori i roto i ngā tau - ngā huringa ki ngā tikanga whaiaro o te tangata, me ngā huringa hoki ki te iwi Māori whānui. 

Kei te kī a ia kua rerekē te ao Māori i ēnei rā, he rerekē ngā whakaaro, ngā whanonga, me ngā uara o te hunga rangatahi, i ō rātou mātua, tīpuna rānei. Heoi, ahakoa ngā huringa ki te tangata takitahi, kei te mau tonu ngā hononga ā-iwi, te tuakiritanga Māori, me te Māoritanga.

Nō reira, ko te kaupapa matua o te waiata nei, ko te hiranga o te mau tonu ki ō tātou tikanga me tō tātou Māoritanga, ahakoa ngā huringa o te wā - ngā huringa ki a tātau ake, ki tō tātou iwi hoki. Koirā te tino kiko o te kōwhiringa D.

Question:
Ko te kaitono tuhituhi he Mehikihi-Amerika, ā, ko te whakaaro e hiahiatia ana e ia he whiringa nui o nga kaipōti o Mehikihi kia whiwhi ai i te pōti. Ko te hua, ko tana kaiwhakahaere whakahau, ka whakatau kia mēra ki ia kaipōti o Mehikihi kua rēhitatia he whakapiripiri roimata, e mau ana i te ingoa me te tari o te kaitono e whakahaere ana a ia. I te mea he tokomaha nga tāngata māori o Mehikihi kāore i te mōhio ki te pānui me te tuhituhi Ingarihi, e whakapono ana te kaiwhakahaere whakahau he uaua ki te tokomaha o nga kaipōti te tuhi i te ingoa me te tari o te kaitono i runga i te pōti. Ko te hua, kua whakatūria e te kaiwhakahaere whakahau tētahi whakahau pāpāho whānui hei whakamōhio atu ki ngā kaipōti me pēhea te hoatu i ngā whakapiri ki te pōti. E rima marama i mua i te pōti ka whakamōhiotia e tētahi mana pōti te komiti whakahau a te kaitono kāore nga whakapiri roimata e ū ana ki te tikanga o te kāwanatanga. I roto i tana reta, ka whakamārama te mana ko nga kaiwhakahaere pōti o te kāwanatanga, he whakaaro tērā e hiahiatia ana e nga kaipōti tūpono ki te tuhi waituhi i te ingoa o te kaitono. Na reira, ka whakamutua e ia kaore nga whakapiripiri e ū ana ki nga whakaritenga ā-ture. E toru wiki i muri iho, ka whakaputaina e te kaitono te hūtu i te kōti o te rohe o te kāwanatanga ki nga kaiwhakahaere pōti o te kāwanatanga e kī ana ko to rātau whakamāramatanga o te tikanga o te kāwanatanga e takahi ana i te Kaupapa Ture o U. S. Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei, mēnā ka whakatūria, ka whakaritea te tautohe ā-kaupapa tino kaha e tautoko ana i te whakamāramatanga a te mana pōti o te tikanga?
A.Neke atu i te 1% o te katoa o te āhua o te pōti i waenganui i ngā kaipōti o Amerika i rēhitatia, kāore i te iti iho i te 1% o te katoa o te āhua o te pōti.
B.E hiahiatia ana e tētahi tikanga kāwanatanga kia whakarahia ia wāhi pōti ki tētahi pene waituhi hei whakangāwari i te tuhituhi i roto i ngā pōti.
C.Nā te nuinga o ngā pōti tuhi-mai e whakanui ake ana i te wā e hiahiatia ana hei tatau i ngā pōti katoa, me maka aua pōti i runga i te āhua ōrite.
D.He tino nui ake te kaha mo te tinihanga pōti ki nga whakapiripiri tōmua.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B: E hiahiatia ana e tētahi tikanga kāwanatanga kia whakarahia ia wāhi pōti ki tētahi pene waituhi hei whakangāwari i te tuhituhi i roto i ngā pōti.

He kaha ake tēnei tautohe i ērā atu mō te take nei:

A. Kāore he hononga tika i waenganui i te ōrau o ngā kaipōti Amerika i rēhitatia me te take mēnā he tika ngā whakapiripiri roimata i raro i te ture.

C. Ahakoa ka roa ake pea te wā hei tatau i ngā pōti tuhi-mai, kāore tēnei i te whakaatu he hē ngā whakapiripiri roimata i raro i te ture.

D. Ahakoa tērā pea he tūponotanga nui ake o te tinihanga pōti ki ngā whakapiripiri tōmua, kāore tēnei i te whakaatu he hē rawa ngā whakapiripiri i raro i te ture.

Engari mā te whakarahi i ngā pene waituhi ki ia wāhi pōti (B), ka ngāwari ake te tuhituhi i ngā pōti mā ngā kaipōti. Mā tēnei e tautoko i te whakaaro a te mana pōti me tuhi ngā kaipōti i te ingoa o te kaitono, ā, nā reira kāore ngā whakapiripiri roimata i te ū ki te ture. Nō reira ko te B te whakautu pai rawa.

Question:
E kī ana a Nagel e tūhono tata ana te raruraru o te waimarie tūturu ki te raruraru o:
A.Te oratanga o te Atua.
B.Te wāteatanga o te wira.
C.whakakotahitanga ā-hinengaro.
D.ngā ao whānui.
GivenAnswer:
E ai ki tāku e mōhio nei, e kōrero ana a Thomas Nagel mō te hononga o te raruraru o te waimarie tūturu (the problem of moral luck) ki te raruraru o te wāteatanga o te wira (the problem of free will).

I tāna tuhinga rongonui "Moral Luck" (1979), e whakapae ana a Nagel ko tā tātou aromatawai i ngā mahi a tētahi atu e tino whakawhirinaki ana ki ngā āhuatanga kei tua atu i tō rātou mana - pērā i ō rātou pūmanawa, ō rātou whakatinanatanga, me ngā hua o ā rātou mahi. Nā reira, he uaua te kī atu he 'tika ā-tikanga' ngā mahi a tētahi.

E tūhono ana tēnei ki te raruraru o te wāteatanga o te wira, e pātai ana mēnā he mana tūturu tō tātou mō ā tātou mahi me ā tātou whakatau. Ki te kore tātou e wātea ana ki te kōwhiri, he pēhea tā tātou noho haepapa mō ā tātou mahi?

Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika ko B - te wāteatanga o te wira. E ai ki a Nagel, e tino hononga ana ēnei raruraru e rua o te waimarie tūturu me te wāteatanga o te wira.

Question:
He kaha whenua to te kaporeihana whare. I whakaritea e te kaporeihana whare he mahere whanaketanga hai wehe i te whenua ki te 100 rota, a, ka waihanga i tētahi iwi noho i runga i te kaha. I wawe tonu te tīmata o te kaitiaki ki te hoko waipiro i runga i nga kāinga i roto i nga rōpū "i muri iho" i ia wiki. Ko te pāhonotanga a nga kaipupuri kāinga e whakahau ana i te taupoki i roto i tētahi mahi mo nga tūkinotanga. Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei te tautohe tino pai mo te librarian?
A.Ko te ture i roto i te Kēhi o Perehitini e ārai ana i te āheitanga o te kaitiaki.
B.Kaore te kaitiaki i te whakawātea i te kānataraki ki te pāhonotanga a nga kaipupuri kāinga.

GivenAnswer:
