4. Ko te pāhonotanga a ngā kaipupuri kāinga e whakahau ana i te taupoki i roto i tētahi mahi mo ngā tūkinotanga, nā reira ka taea e rātou te whai i tētahi mahi ki te kaitiaki mo te takahi i ngā rāhuitanga.

Nā reira, ko te tautohe pai rawa atu ko te kaitiaki kaore i te whakawātea i te kānataraki ki te pāhonotanga a ngā kaipupuri kāinga mā te takahi i ngā rāhuitanga i roto i te Whakapuakitanga o Covenants me te rīhi.

Question:
Te iwi o Nubian:
A.I whakaritea, a, ka whakahīhī i te pikinga o te ahurea o Ihipiana.
B.Ko te hua o te whakawāteatanga o Mesopotamian i te tonga.
C.I hangaia hei urupare, engari kaore i roto i te whakaputa i te ahurea o Ihipiana.
D.Kaore he hoapā ki nga tikanga noho tata.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te C: I hangaia hei urupare, engari kaore i roto i te whakaputa i te ahurea o Ihipiana.

Ko te iwi o Nubian i noho ki te tonga o Ihipa, i te rohe e mōhiotia ana ināianei ko Sudan. I whakawhanaketia e rātou tō rātou ake ahurea motuhake, ahakoa i whai pānga nui te ahurea o Ihipa ki a rātou. 

Ētahi kōrero hāngai:

- Nā te tata o Nubia ki Ihipa, he nui ngā whitiwhitinga i waenga i ngā iwi e rua, pērā i te hokohoko me te tauwhitiwhiti ahurea. Heoi, i pupuri tonu te iwi o Nubia i tō rātou tuakiri motuhake.

- I ētahi wā, i whai kaha te tōrangapū o Nubia, ā, i taea e rātou te whakahaere i ētahi wāhanga o te tonga o Ihipa. 

- He maha ngā āhuatanga o te ahurea o Nubia i rite ki ō Ihipa, pērā i ngā ohaoha whare kingi, ngā tikanga tanu tūpāpaku, me te toi whakairo. Engari he rerekētanga nui tonu, e whakaatu ana ehara te iwi o Nubia i te iwi Ihipiana noa.

Nō reira, ahakoa te pānga nui o Ihipa, i whakawhanaketia e te iwi o Nubia tō rātou ake ahurea motuhake, hāunga i te whakaritea, whakahīhī rānei i te ahurea o Ihipa.

Question:
Ko te rōia te māhunga o ēhea o ngā mea e whai ake nei?
A.Te Komiti Whakawāwā o te Senate
B.Te Tari Ture
C.Te Tari Kāwanatanga
D.Te Komihana a te Kaiwhakawā o te Kaiwhakawā
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko:

B. Te Tari Ture

Ko te Rōia Matua (Attorney General) te māhunga o te Tari Ture (Department of Justice) o te Kāwanatanga o Amerika. Ko tā rātou he whakahaere i te ture, tiaki i te haumaru o te iwi, me te whakatutuki i te tika mō ngā tāngata katoa o Amerika.

Question:
I roto i tēhea wāhi o te pānga tūmatanui, tērā pea ka whakaurua te hononga?
A.Rangatōpū
B.Ngā pānga pūtea
C.Ngā take tūmatanui
D.Pakihi ki te umanga
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te C. Ngā take tūmatanui.

I roto i te pānga tūmatanui, ka uru atu ngā take e pā ana ki te iwi whānui, pēnei i ngā kaupapa here kāwanatanga, ngā ratonga tūmatanui me ngā take pāpori whānui. Ko te hononga tētahi huarahi e taea ai e ngā rōpū, ngā umanga me ngā tāngata takitahi te whai wāhi atu ki ēnei take tūmatanui mā te whakapā atu ki ngā kaitōrangapū me te kāwanatanga.

Question:
Ko te kupu 'chili con carne' e pā ana ki te chili me te aha?
A.pīni
B.mīti
C.tīhi
D.pepa chili
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B. mīti.

I roto i te reo Pāniora, ko te tikanga o 'chili con carne' ko te 'chili with meat'. Ko te kupu 'carne' e tohu ana i te mīti, ā, ko te momo mīti e whakamahia nuitia ana ko te mīti kau.

Nō reira, ahakoa he tino kai a te chili con carne i ētahi atu āhuatanga pērā i te pīni, tīhi rānei, ko tōna āhuatanga matua ko te mīti kua kohuatia me te chili, tae atu ki ētahi atu tāpiri pērā i te rīwai, tōmato me ngā huamata.

Question:
E mōhiotia ana te kupu tauhira Daodejing e te taitara i te reo Ingarihi?
A.Tauhira o ngā Huringa
B.Tauhira o te Ara me te Hiko
C.Tauhira o nga Wāhine
D.Tauhira o te Whakaaro
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B. Tauhira o te Ara me te Hiko.

I te reo Ingarihi, e mōhiotia ana te Daodejing ko te "Tao Te Ching", e whakapākehātia ana ko te "Book of the Way and its Virtue" (Tauhira o te Ara me te Hiko).

He tuhinga tawhito nō Haina te Daodejing, he mea tito e Laozi i te rautau tuaono i mua i te wā o Karaiti. He tuhinga whakahirahira tēnei mō te whakaaro Taoist, e aro ana ki te āhua o te noho i runga i te ara tika, te whai i te māramatanga, me te noho mārie i roto i te ao.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā mea e whai ake nei e whakamārama ana i te āhuatanga i muri i te whakarewatanga o te utu i runga i tētahi hua e hiahiatia ana e te tāwari?
A.Kaore te nuinga e hiahiatia ana e huri.
B.Ka nui haere te nuinga e hiahiatia ana.
C.Ka heke te katoa o ngā moni hua.
D.Kāore te katoa o ngā moni hua e huri.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B: Ka nui haere te nuinga e hiahiatia ana.

I muri i te whakarewatanga o te utu i runga i tētahi hua, ka heke te hiahia o ngā tāwari ki te hoko i taua hua. Nā te mea kua piki ake te utu, kāore e taea e ētahi tāwari te utu i te utu hou, nō reira ka heke te hiahia ki te hoko.

Heoi anō, ahakoa ka heke te hiahia o ia tāwari takitahi, ka piki te moni whiwhi mō ia hua e hokona ana. Nā tēnei, ahakoa ka heke pea te maha o ngā hua e hokona ana, ka piki te moni whiwhi katoa (te nuinga e hiahiatia ana) nā te mea he nui ake te utu mō ia hua.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā mea tino pai e whai ake nei e whakamārama ana i te Ūropi?
A.Ko te Ūropi he kāhua tātaritanga e whakaritea ai ngā rōpū Pākehā ki ngā rōpū pākehā-kore ki te whakaputa i tētahi whakataurite kāore i te mōhiotia o ia painga pātahi.
B.He kāhua whakaaro te Ūropi e whakatakotoria ai te aromatawai me te arotakenga o ngā rōpū kāore i Ūropi ki ngā whakaaro ahurea me ngā tītaha o ngā Pākehā.
C.E whakaahua ana te Ūropi i ngā akoranga, i ngā mahi tohunga rānei e whakaaro ana ki ngā pūnaha tōrangapū, ohaoha rānei o Ūropi.
D.Ēnei kōwhiringa katoa.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B: He kāhua whakaaro te Ūropi e whakatakotoria ai te aromatawai me te arotakenga o ngā rōpū kāore i Ūropi ki ngā whakaaro ahurea me ngā tītaha o ngā Pākehā.

I roto i tēnei horopaki, ko te Ūropi he tirohanga e whakaaro ana ki ngā iwi kāore nō Ūropi mā te tirohanga Pākehā, me te whakataurite i aua iwi ki ngā paerewa me ngā uara Pākehā. Ka whakaatu tēnei i te hē, nā te mea kāore e tika ana kia whakawākia ngā ahurea rerekē ki ngā paerewa o tētahi atu ahurea.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei he tuhinga whaiaro me te āheitanga kati?
A.kāwanatanga 'pepa mā'
B.pūkete rongoā muna
C.pukapuka pūkete kāinga
D.te rēhita hea o tētahi umanga
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B - pūkete rongoā muna.

He tuhinga whaiaro te pūkete rongoā muna nā te mea he mōhiohio whaiaro, muna hoki kei roto e pā ana ki te hauora o te tangata. Kāore e taea e te tangata te toro atu ki ēnei mōhiohio, ā, he here ā-ture tō ngā tākuta, nēhi me ētahi atu kaimahi hauora kia noho muna ai ēnei kōrero.

Ehara te kāwanatanga 'pepa mā', te pukapuka pūkete kāinga me te rēhita hea o tētahi umanga i te tuhinga whaiaro, ā, ka taea pea te toro atu e ētahi atu i raro i ētahi āhuatanga.

Question:
Ko te nuinga o te wā e whai ana ngā moroiti rorohiko hōu i te huānga?
A.Konutai
B.Takawai
C.Aluminum
D.Hiriwa
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B. Takawai.

I te nuinga o te wā, ko te takawai te huānga e whāia ana e ngā moroiti rorohiko hōu. He māmā, he kaha, he pai hoki te whakahaere kōmaru o te takawai, nā reira he tino pai mō ngā moroiti rorohiko. Kei te whakamahia whānuitia te takawai i roto i ngā wāhanga o ngā pūrere rorohiko pērā i ngā pūtake CPU me ngā kāri whakairoiro.

Ehara te konutai, te aluminum me te hiriwa i te mea nui rawa atu mō ngā moroiti rorohiko i te mea he taumaha ake, he uaua ake te mahi, ā, he nui ake te utu i te takawai.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā piro e whai ake nei e tautoko ana i te tautohe mo te taha kotahi o Amerika?
A.Hegemony
B.Te āhuatanga o te huarahi huarahi
C.Mana o Amerika
D.Ngā mea katoa o runga
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te D - Ngā mea katoa o runga.

He maha ngā piro e tautoko ana i te tautohe mō te taha kotahi o Amerika, tae atu ki:

A. Hegemony - ko te mana, te mana rānei o tētahi whenua ki runga i ētahi atu. He nui te mana o Amerika i te ao.

B. Te āhuatanga o te huarahi huarahi - ko te whakawhitiwhiti ohaoha, ahurea hoki i waenga i ngā whenua e rua. He kaha te hononga i waenga i Amerika me ētahi atu whenua.

C. Mana o Amerika - ko te kaha o Amerika ki te whakawhiwhi i ōna ake hiahia i roto i ngā take ao. He nui te mana o Amerika hei whakatau take ao.

Nā reira, e tautoko ana ēnei piro katoa i te whakaaro kotahi mō te taha o Amerika i roto i ngā take ao.

Question:
I whakaaturia e ngā mātauranga ki te rauropi o Schizophrenia tētahi āhuatanga iranga ki te āhuatanga, engari kei roto ētahi atu take. Mai i tō mōhiotanga ki te kaupapa e mōhio ana ko tēhea o ngā tauākī e whai ake nei e hē ana.
A.Tērā pea he āhuatanga kaitāpae te mahi mahi, te tairongotanga rānei ki te mahi.
B.He tohu kē atu nga tūroro mā.
C.Ko te whakawāteatanga mai i te here o te Ao Tuatoru ko te 65%.
D.He iti iho te mokatere o Schizophrenia i kitea i waenganui i ngā Kaiāwhina o Āwherika.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te tauākī C te tauākī hē: "Ko te whakawāteatanga mai i te here o te Ao Tuatoru ko te 65%."

Kāore he taunakitanga mō tēnei kōrero. Ahakoa he rerekē te nui o te mate Schizophrenia i waenga i ngā momo iwi rerekē, kāore he rangahau e tohu ana kei te 65% te nui o te whakawāteatanga i roto i ngā whenua o te Ao Tuatoru.

Ko ētahi atu kōrero tika:

A. Ka taea te mahi, te tairongotanga rānei te noho hei tohu mōrearea mō te Schizophrenia.

B. He tohu kē atu tā ngā tūroro wāhine i ngā tāne, pērā i te ohotata me te ahotea.

D. Kua kitea he iti iho te nui o te Schizophrenia i waenga i ngā uri o Āwherika, i te taha o ētahi atu rōpū iwi.

Question:
I roto i te horopaki o te huri noa, me pēhea e taea ai e mātou te tautuhi i te kupu 'whanaketanga'?
A.Ko te wā whanaketanga e pā ana ki te āhuatanga tangata e wātea ai te wāteatanga i te wehi me te hiahia; He rawaka ngā rauemi hei tautoko i te ora, ā, ka tīari tēnei oranga i tētahi āhua e wātea ana i te tuma, i te tuma rānei e mōhiotia ana, o te haukoti ohorere.
B.Kia whakaarohia hei whakawhanake, me tutuki i tētahi iwi ētahi tūnga ohaoha, tōrangapū hoki i roto i te pūnaha āhua o te ao whānui; ko te paearu mō ngā mea e noho ana he āhua 'i hangaia' e aua whakaritenga tauwhitinga i tēnei pūnaha.
C.Ko te whanaketanga he tikanga ki te whakatau i nga rerekētanga e noho tahi ana i te ao whānui. I tēnei horopaki, e pā ana te whanaketanga ki te kaha o te iwi whānui, hapori rānei ki te whakamahi tika i ngā rauemi me te whakanui ake i te tōtika i te whakaputa me te tuari, e whakatoko ana i te tuari moni nui ake i roto i te iwi.
D.Ko te whanaketanga o tētahi hapori e pā ana ki ngā pūnaha uara pūnaha, tika hoki e ohauru ai tōna iwi whānui. I roto i te pūnaha ao whānui o te ao whānui, e pā ana tēnei ki te whakatamarikitanga o ngā ariā manapori ki te uru me te ohaoha o te mākete wātea.
GivenAnswer:
I roto i te horopaki o te huri noa, ko te whakamārama tika mō te kupu 'whanaketanga' ko te kōwhiringa C.

Ko te whanaketanga he tikanga ki te whakatau i ngā rerekētanga e noho tahi ana i te ao whānui. I tēnei horopaki, e pā ana te whanaketanga ki te kaha o te iwi whānui, hapori rānei ki te whakamahi tika i ngā rauemi me te whakanui ake i te tōtika i te whakaputa me te tuari, e whakatoko ana i te tuari moni nui ake i roto i te iwi.

He mea nui tēnei whakamārama nā te mea e aro ana ki ngā take matua o te whanaketanga i roto i te horopaki o te huri noa:
1. Te whakatau i ngā rerekētanga i roto i te ao whānui
2. Te kaha o ngā iwi me ngā hapori ki te whakamahi tika i ngā rauemi
3. Te whakanui ake i te tōtika i te whakaputa me te tuari
4. Te whakatoko i te tuari moni nui ake i roto i te iwi

Kāore ngā kōwhiringa e toe ana e aro ana ki ēnei āhuatanga matua o te whanaketanga i roto i te horopaki o te huri noa.

Question:
E pātahi ana te Pūtake o te Communidades ki tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei?
A.Pīhopa Hoka Romaro
B.Te whakahaere me te whakahōu
C.Te rangatiratanga o te tangata katoa
D.Ngā mea katoa o runga
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te C. Te rangatiratanga o te tangata katoa.

I roto i te Pūtake o te Communidades (Universal Declaration of Human Rights), e pātahi ana ki te rangatiratanga o te tangata katoa. Ko tēnei te tino pūtake o te Pūtake, e whakapuaki ana i te mana taurite o ngā tāngata katoa, ahakoa ko wai, nō hea rānei. 

Kāore te Pūtake e hāngai ana ki a Pīhopa Hoka Romaro (he tangata rongonui ia, engari ehara ia i te kaupapa matua o te Pūtake). Kāore hoki e kōrero ana mō te whakahaere me te whakahōu, he kaupapa kē ērā. Waihoki, ahakoa he maha ngā mea e kapi ana i te Pūtake, kāore e taea te kī ko ngā mea katoa o runga.

Nō reira, ko te rangatiratanga o te tangata te tino pūtake o te Pūtake o te Communidades.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā mea tino pai e whai ake nei e whakamārama ana i ngā tohutohu tika e pā ana ki ngā āhuatanga tōkai me ngā kiritaki rongoā o mua?
A.E rāhuitia ana nga tohunga hinengaro kia kauā e whai āhuatanga ā-waha ki nga kiritaki rongoā o mua i raro i nga āhuatanga katoa.
B.E rāhuitia ana ngā tohunga hinengaro kia kauā e whai āhuatanga ā-waha ki ngā kiritaki rongoā o mua mō te kotahi tau i muri i te whakamutunga o te rongoā.
C.E rāhuitia ana ngā tohunga hinengaro kia kaua e whai āhuatanga ā-waha ki ngā kiritaki rongoā o mua i ētahi āhuatanga (hei tauira, ina mōrearea te apo).
D.Kaore nga tohunga hinengaro i rāhuitia kia kauā e whai āhuatanga ā-waha ki nga kiritaki rongoā o mua.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te C. E rāhuitia ana ngā tohunga hinengaro kia kaua e whai āhuatanga ā-waha ki ngā kiritaki rongoā o mua i ētahi āhuatanga (hei tauira, ina mōrearea te apo).

I raro i ngā aratohu matatika mō ngā tohunga hinengaro, he mea tika te rāhui i ngā āhuatanga ā-waha ki ngā kiritaki rongoā o mua. Engari ehara i te mea e rāhuitia ana i ngā wā katoa. Hei tauira, mēnā he mōrearea nui tonu ki te kiritaki, ka whakaaetia pea te whai hononga ā-waha hei tiaki i a rātou. 

Ko te mea nui kia āta whakaarohia ngā pānga matatika me ngā mōreareatanga ka puta i ngā hononga pēnei, ā, me whai i ngā aratohu ngaio e hāngai ana.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā kaupapa e whai ake nei e arotahi ana ki te whakahaere a te iwi ki te mahi i ngā ngohe e hiahiatia ana hei pupuri i te raupapa me te pūmautanga?
A.Taumahitanga
B.Tauhohenga
C.ariā whakatau-ā-ringa
D.ariā papā
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te A. Taumahitanga.

I roto i te horopaki o te whakahaere, ko te taumahitanga te kaupapa e arotahi ana ki te whakahaere a te iwi ki te mahi i ngā ngohe e hiahiatia ana hei pupuri i te raupapa me te pūmautanga o te whakahaere.

Ko te taumahitanga te taumata o te herenga ā-hinengaro me te ā-kare ā-roto o te kaimahi ki tana mahi me te whakahaere. Ka hua mai te taumahitanga i te whakapono o te kaimahi ki ngā uara me ngā whāinga o te whakahaere, me tana hiahia ki te whai wāhi atu, me te mahi nui ake i tērā e tika ana mō te painga o te whakahaere.

Kāore ngā kōwhiringa B (Tauhohenga), C (ariā whakatau-ā-ringa), D (ariā papā) e hāngai tika ana ki te pātai, nā te mea kāore ēnei e arotahi ana ki te whakahaere a te iwi ki te mahi i ngā ngohe e hiahiatia ana hei pupuri i te raupapa me te pūmautanga.

Question:
Ko ngā raina āpure hautō mō tētahi puka waea waea o nāianei
A.porowhita
B.rārangi radial
C.o nāianei eddy
D.koromeke pūngao
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B. rārangi radial.

I roto i ngā puka waea o nāianei, ka whakamahia ngā rārangi radial hei whakarato i te hiko ki ngā wāhanga rerekē o te puka waea. Ko ngā rārangi radial he momo raina āpure hautō e puta mai ana i te pokapū o te puka waea ka tohatoha haere ki waho, pērā i ngā tīhi o tētahi wīra. 

Kāore ngā kōwhiringa atu i te tika:
- Ehara te porowhita i te momo raina āpure hautō e whakamahia ana i roto i ngā puka waea o nāianei.
- Ko te "o nāianei eddy" tētahi kupu kāore e tino mārama, engari kāore pea e hāngai ana ki ngā raina āpure hautō.
- Ko te koromeke pūngao tētahi mea rerekē, ehara i te momo raina āpure hautō.

Nō reira, ko ngā rārangi radial te whakautu tika mō tēnei pātai.

Question:
I whiwhi nga pirihimana i tētahi aki mai i tētahi kaitiaki pono kai te mahi te tangata i te rongoā i tōna kāinga. Kātahi ka tukuna atu e nga āpiha ki te kaiwhakawā he oati tautohe e whakaatu ana i te take tūpono mo te whakaputa i tētahi whakamana rapu. Ka tukuna e te kaiwhakawā he whakamana rapu mo nga rongoā rongoā i te wāhitau o te tangata. Ka haere nga āpiha pirihimana ki te kāinga o taua tangata, a, ka tangi i te pere tatau. No te korenga o tētahi tangata e whakautu, ka pakaru nga pirihimana, a, ka tomo ki te nohoanga. I rapua e rātau nga rūma i runga i te papa tuatahi, a, kaore i kitea he whakaaturanga whakararuraru, kātahi ka haere ki waho, a, ka kite i tētahi tomokanga motuhake e ahu ana ki te papa tuarua o te nohoanga. Ka piki atu rātau ki te huarahi, a, ka tomo ki roto i te rūma moe. I roto i te rūma ka kitea e nga āpiha he rehu o te hīkaka e takoto ana i runga i te kākahu. I a rātau e haere tonu ana nga āpiha ki te rapu i te rūma moe, ka tomo te tangata whakapae ki te rūma. Ka pātai atu nga pirihimana ki te tangata whakapae mehemea ko ia te tangata. Ka kitea e te tangata whakapae a ia, a, ka kī atu ki nga pirihimana kai roto rātau i tōna rūma moe, a, ka nohoia e ia te papa tuarua o te nohoanga. Ka whakamātauria e te tangata whakapae e noho ana te tangata i runga i te papa tuatahi, a, i wehea ōna wāhi ora i te hunga whakapae. Ahakoa rā, i whakatakotoria te tangata whakapae ki raro i te hopu, a, ka whakahaua ki te pupuri i te rongoā. Kua whakaputaina e te tangata whakapae he mōtini hai aukati i te hīkaka kia kore ai e whakaaetia ki te whakaaturanga. Ko te tikanga ko te mōtini a te tangata whakapae ko
A.I tukuna, no te mea kaore te whakamana i whakaingoa i te hunga whakapae.
B.I tukuna, nā te mea kāore te whakamana i āhua i runga i te tauwhāititanga o te rohe kia rapua.
C.Ka whakakāhore, no te mea i whakapono tika nga pirihimana e rapu ana rātau i te whare o taua tangata i to rātau tomo ki nga wāhi ora o te tangata whakapae.
D.I whakakāhore, nā te mea he tika te whakamana, a, ka tukuna atu he take tūpono.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B. I tukuna te mōtini, nā te mea kāore te whakamana i āhua i runga i te tauwhāititanga o te rohe kia rapua.

I roto i tēnei take, i tukuna e te kaiwhakawā he whakamana rapu mō ngā rongoā rongoā i te wāhitau o te tangata. Heoi, i tomo ngā pirihimana ki te papa tuarua o te nohoanga, he wāhi motuhake i wehea i ngā wāhi ora o te tangata e noho ana i te papa tuatahi. Nā reira, kāore te whakamana i āta tohu i te rohe tika hei rapu mā ngā pirihimana.

Ahakoa i whai whakaaro pono ngā pirihimana, me whakatau tonu te ture i te tauwhāititanga o ngā mana rapu. Kāore te whakamana i tuku mana ki te rapu i te katoa o te whare, engari ko te wāhitau anake o te tangata. Nā reira, me tuku te mōtini, ā, kāore e whakaaetia te hīkaka hei taunakitanga.

Question:
He aha te mate e kore ai e puta mai ngā huaketo?
A.pararaitanga ā-iwi
B.Mate mate
C.mate tare ā-waha
D.mate pukupuku
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B. Mate mate.

Ko te mate mate tētahi o ngā take matua e kore ai e puta mai ngā huaketo i roto i te tāne. Ka pā te mate mate ki ngā tahataha e rua, ā, ka aukati i te whakaputa huaketo. 

Ko ētahi atu take e kore ai pea e puta mai ngā huaketo ko:
- Pararaitanga ā-iwi (STIs) pērā i te kāpō (chlamydia)
- Raruraru hauora pērā i te mate huka
- Pānga ki ngā matū pērā i te patu tarukino, kai hikareti rānei  
- Taumaha-kino, whakapōrearea rānei
- Raruraru ira pērā i te Klinefelter syndrome

Engari, ko te mate mate te take nui rawa atu mō te kore puta o ngā huaketo. Mēnā he āwangawanga ōu, he pai ki te kōrero ki tō tākuta.

Question:
Kātahi anō ka whakatuwhera anō te hokomaha i muri i te katinga o te rua wiki mo nga whakatikatikatanga. I te ata o te whakatuwhera anō, ka hokohoko tētahi wahine i tana takanga ohorere, a, ka pā ki te waewae pakaru. I muri iho, ka whiua e te wahine te hokomaha mo nga mate whaiaro. I roto i tōna hūtu, ka kī te wahine kua haere a ia ki runga i tētahi pākete peita e takoto ana i roto i tētahi o nga ara. I te whakawātanga, ka karangatia e te wahine tētahi atu kiritaki hai whakaatu, i a ia e hokohoko ana, ka rongo a ia i te thud, ka huri, ka kite i te wahine e taka ana i runga i te papa. I whakaaturia hoki e ia i kite a ia i tētahi pākete peita wātea e takoto ana i ētahi waewae ruarua i te waewae o te wahine. I runga i te whakamātautau whakawhiti, ka uru te kiritaki ki tētahi whakawhitinga tautohe ki te rōia o te hokomaha. No te pātaitanga ki tōna whakaaro he aha te take o te hinganga o te wahine, ka whakaaturia e te kiritaki, "I hinga a ia nā te mea i haere a ia ki runga i te pākete. " Heoi anō, i whakaae a ia ki te whakamātautau whakawhiti, kaore tonu a ia i kite i te haerenga o te wahine i runga i te pākete. Kātahi ka pātai atu te rōia o te hokomaha ki te kiritaki i te pātai e whai ake nei:"Ki te kore koe e kite i te wahine e haere ana i runga i te pākete, me pēhea koe e mōhio ai kua hinga a ia nā reira?" Ka whakautua e te kiritaki, "Nā te mea i kōrero mai taku kōtiro e hokohoko tahi ana me au ā muri ake ka kite a ia i te wahine e haere ana i runga i te pākete. " Ka neke te rōia o te hokomaha ki te tuki i te whakautu whakamutunga a te kiritaki. Ki te whakakorea e te kaiwhakawā whakawā te mōtini a te tangata whakapae, ā, ka whakaaetia te whakautu a te kiritaki kia tū, tērā pea nā te mea
A.I pōhiritia te whakautu a te kiritaki e te pātai a te rōia o te hokomaha.
B.I takea te whakautu a te kiritaki i runga i te mātauranga tuatahi.
C.Ko te whakautu a te kiritaki he kōrero mo te whakaaro o mua tata nei.
D.He ariā mōhio te whakautu a te kiritaki i tēnei wā.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te (A) - I pōhiritia te whakautu a te kiritaki e te pātai a te rōia o te hokomaha.

I roto i te kōrero, i pātai te rōia o te hokomaha ki te kiritaki me pēhea ia e mōhio ai kua hinga te wahine nā te pākete, ahakoa kāore ia i kite. Nā taua pātai, i akiaki, i pōhiri rānei i te kiritaki ki te kōrero i tētahi mea kāore i kitea e ia, engari i kōrerotia e tana tamāhine. 

Ehara tēnei i te mātauranga tuatahi (B), nā te mea kāore te kiritaki i kite i te wahine e hinga ana. Ehara hoki i te kōrero mō te whakaaro o mua (C), he kōrero kē mō tā tana tamāhine i kite ai. Ehara hoki i te ariā mōhio (D), he kōrero kē mō ngā kitenga o tētahi atu.

Nā reira, ko te whakautu tika ko (A) - nā te pātai a te rōia i pōhiri, i akiaki i te kiritaki ki te kōrero i tētahi mea kāore i kitea e ia anō.

Question:
Ka kitea e te kaimahi o te umanga whakanao nui te mahi, a, ka whai i te mahi mo te moni anake. He iti noa iho te mahi a te kaimahi, ā, kāore i te tino whakahauhautia kia tino nui rawa, kia pai ake rānei te kounga. E ai ki te ariā āhuatanga rua a F. Herzberg, ko te huarahi pai rawa atu o te 10 e whakanui ake ana i te whakahauhau a tēnei kaimahi, ko te tikanga kia
A.tukuna he utu whakarewa me te tohutohu mō te hua nui ake
B.hoahoa anō i te mahi hei whakarato i tētahi uaua me te āhua o te mahi
C.whakanui ake i ngā huarahi mō te tauwhitinga pāpori mōhiotia
D.whakarato tai mahi ki te kaimahi e mau ana i te mana nui ake
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika, ki taku titiro, ko te B - hoahoa anō i te mahi hei whakarato i tētahi uaua me te āhua o te mahi.

E ai ki te ariā āhuatanga rua a Herzberg, ko ngā take whakahauhau pēnei i te mahi whakahirahira, te whakaae, te haepapa me te whakatutukitanga, he mea nui ake mō te whakaohooho i te kaimahi, tēnā i ngā take hauora pēnei i te utu, ngā āhuatanga mahi, me ngā hononga pāpori.

Mā te hoahoa anō i te mahi kia whakarato i te uaua me te āhua o te mahi, ka rongo pea te kaimahi i te whakahirahira me te whakatutukitanga, ā, ka piki te whakahauhau. 

Ahakoa he mea pai te utu whakarewa (A), ngā hononga pāpori pai ake (C), me te mana (D), kāore ēnei i te aro atu ki ngā take matua e whakaohooho ana i te kaimahi, e ai ki a Herzberg. Nā reira, ko te B te whakautu pai rawa atu hei whakapiki i te whakahauhau o tēnei kaimahi.

Question:
Ko te take o tētahi akoranga taurua, akoranga taurua rānei ko:
A.Eke ana ki te whakataurite i ngā kaupapa kua whakamahia, kāore i te whakamahia
B.Whakaititia ngā pānga o te rerekētanga sampling
C.Karohia te kaitirotiro me te tītaha kaupapa
D.Karohia te tītaha kaitirotiro me te rerekētanga
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te B - Whakaititia ngā pānga o te rerekētanga sampling.

Ko te akoranga taurua, he tikanga rangahau e whakamahia ana hei whakaiti i te pānga o ngā rerekētanga kei waenga i ngā rōpū e rua e whakamātauria ana. Mā te whakarite kia ōrite, kia taurite rānei ngā āhuatanga o ngā rōpū e rua (hāunga te mea e whakamātauria ana), ka āwhina ki te whakapono ko ngā rerekētanga i kitea i ngā hua, nā te mea anake i whakamātauria.

Ehara i te mahi a te akoranga taurua ki te whakataurite i ngā kaupapa kua whakamahia, kāore rānei (kōwhiringa A), te karo i te tītaha a te kaitirotiro me te kaupapa (kōwhiringa C), te karo rānei i te tītaha kaitirotiro me te rerekētanga (kōwhiringa D). Ko tāna he whakaiti noa i te pānga o ngā rerekētanga tauwhāiti i waenga i ngā rōpū rangahau.

Question:
Ka haere mai tētahi wahine e 54 tau ki te tari nā te mea kua whakararurarutia e ia te mamae i runga i tōna pāpāringa matau me te kauae i roto i ngā wiki e 3 kua hipa atu nei. Ko ia wāhanga o te mamae e mutu ana mo te 1 hēkona, iti iho rānei. I te nuinga o te wā e whakaohotia ana te mamae e te hau mātao, te ngaungau, te whakatinanatanga, me te paraihe i ōna niho. Kaore ōna mate ki te kanohi, ki te māhunga rānei. He mea whakamīharo te hītori rongoā mo te ānini, te hākinakina, me te mahinga karo korohū. E 165 cm a ia (5 ft 5 i roto) te roa, ā, e 62 kiro (137 whatīanga); Ko BMI e 23 kiro/m2 . He pūnoa nga tohu Vital. Kaore e taea e te tūroro te whakaae ki te pā ki te taha matau o te kanohi. Kaore he ngoikoretanga kanohi, he ngaromanga rānei o te rongo. Kaore he rerekē o te toenga o te whakamātautau ōkiko. Kāore he rerekē o te karapa CT o te māhunga me te kore taumira e whakaatu i ngā rerekētanga. Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei te rongoā tino tika i tēnei wā?
A.Carbamazepine
B.Lamotrigine
C.Levetiracetam
D.Hoa Runga
GivenAnswer:
D. Hoa Runga

Ko te whakaahuatanga o ngā tohumate o tēnei tūroro e rite ana ki te mate neuralgia trigeminal, he mate mamae kaha, ohorere hoki e pā ana ki te kauae me te kanohi. 

Ahakoa he maha ngā rongoā hei whakamāmā i te mamae o te neuralgia trigeminal, ko te rongoā tuatahi ko te Hoa Runga (carbamazepine). He rongoā ārai-kēhua tēnei e mahi pai ana ki te whakaiti i te mamae ohorere o tēnei mate.

Ko ētahi atu kōwhiringa rongoā pēnei i a lamotrigine me levetiracetam, engari ehara ēnei i te rongoā matua mō te neuralgia trigeminal. Ka whakamahia ēnei rongoā mēnā kāore te tūroro i te urupare ki te Hoa Runga, kāore rānei e taea te pāngia e ngā pānga kino.

Nā reira, ko te Hoa Runga te rongoā tika hei tīmata i tēnei wā mō tēnei tūroro e whai tohu o te neuralgia trigeminal. Mēnā kāore e taea, ka whakaarohia ētahi atu kōwhiringa rongoā.

Question:
I mua i te whakatakotoranga o tētahi kaupapa kia hanumi i ngā taone e rua ki runga i te pōti, ka tukuna e te rōia o te kāwanatanga he whakaaro tohutohu e kī ana kāore te mehua, i tōna whakaaro, e takahi ana i ngā whakarato ā-ture, ā-ture rānei. I muri iho, ka whakatakotoria te kaupapa ki runga i te pōti, a, ka tino puta i nga kaipōti i nga taone e rua. I muri i te pōti, engari i mua i te whakahaeretanga o te whakakotahitanga, tokorua nga kaihautū o tētahi o ngā taone i tīmata i te hūtu ki te whakauru i te haumitanga, ka whakaekea te kaupapa o te kaupapa. I tae atu te hūtu ki te kōti matua o te kāwanatanga, a, i kitea he kaupapa ā ture i raro i te kāwanatanga me te ture a te hau. Ināianei ka kōnaetia e nga kaiwhakapae he mōtini e rapu ana kia arotakea tēnei pāhi e te Kōti Matua o U. S. Tērā pea ka taea e te Kōti te kōti
A.Kaore e rongo i te kēhi, no te mea i whakataua i runga i nga taunga motuhake o te āhua.
B.Kaore e rongo i te kēhi, engari tērā pea i whakahokia ki te kōti o te rohe o te hau.
C.whakarongo ki nga take a te hau, engari he whakapeka ki te whakahaere i te take o te kāwanatanga.
D.E whakawhirinaki ana ki te whakaaro tohutohu i tāhuahuatia e te rōia o te kāwanatanga, a, kaore e rongo i te take mo ōna painga.
GivenAnswer:
E ai ki ngā kōrero kua homai, ko taku whakautu ko te kōwhiringa C - ka whakarongo pea te Kōti Matua o U.S. ki ngā take a te hau, engari he whakapeka ki te whakahaere i te take o te kāwanatanga.

I roto i tēnei āhuatanga, ahakoa i whakatakotoria te whakaaro tohutohu e te rōia kāwanatanga, kāore tēnei i aukati i te kōti matua o te kāwanatanga ki te whakatau he kaupapa ā-ture te huihuinga i raro i te kāwanatanga me te ture hau. Nā tēnei whakatau, ka taea e te Kōti Matua te whakarongo ki ngā take a te hau.

Heoi anō, nā te mea kua whakataua kētia e te kōti matua o te kāwanatanga he kaupapa ā-ture te huihuinga i raro i te ture kāwanatanga, he whakapeka pea tō te Kōti Matua ki te whakahaere anō i taua wāhanga o te kēhi. Ka aro kē pea ki ngā take hau anake.

Nō reira, ahakoa ka whakarongo te Kōti Matua ki ngā take hau, he whakapeka tōna ki te whakahaere i ngā take kāwanatanga kua whakataua kētia e te kōti o raro. Ko te kōwhiringa C te whakautu tika rawa atu i tēnei horopaki.

Question:
I tēnei wā ko te kaihautū te rangatira o te pūkete o tētahi mōkihi whenua i tohua hei "A. "Ko te teitei ake o ngā āhuatanga noho tata e rua i runga i te maunga. Ko te kaiahuwhenua te rangatira o te mōkihi "B," e iti iho ana i te "A" i runga i te maunga. I te tau 2000, i hangaia e te kaihautū, nāna ngā mōkihi whenua e rua, he pūnaha wai tūmataiti. Ko tēnei pūnaha ko tētahi ararere o raro, i whakaroa puta noa i nga mōkihi whenua e rua. I rere mai te paraka mai i te mōkihi "A" i roto i te pūnaha ki tētahi pūwhenua, i raro o te maunga. I te tau 2005, ka hokona e te kaihautū te mōkihi "B" ki te kaiahuwhenua. Kaore i roto i te deed ki te kaiahuwhenua tētahi kōrero o te pūnaha wai o te pūtia. Ko te kitenga i runga i ia mōkihi he kāinga kāhua nui e nohoia ana e nga rangatira ake. I tēnei wā, kua tīmata te manga parakaaki ki te whakaputa i tētahi odor hōhā puta noa i te mōkihi "B. "Ko te hua, ka whakahaua e te kaiahuwhenua te kaihautū i te inoi mo nga tūkinotanga i takea mai i te pūnaha wai. Ko te tikanga kia waiho te whakawā mo
A.I te mea kaore he kawenata e whakawhāiti ana i te whakamahinga a te kaihoko, no te mea kāore i roto i te deed ki te kaiahuwhenua ētahi kawenata e whakawhāiti ana i te whakamahinga a te kaihoko i te whenua.
B.Ko te kaihautū, no te mea ko te take tika a te kaiahuwhenua mo te nui, ehara i te hara.
C.Ko te kaiahuwhenua, nā te mea ko te pūnaha wai te take o nga tūkinotanga a te kaiwhakapae hai take ture.
D.Ko te kaiahuwhenua, no te mea kaore i whai mana te kaihautū ki te whakapai ake i tōna ake whenua i runga i te āhua i tūkino ai ki tētahi atu.
GivenAnswer:
Ko taku whakautu ko te kōwhiringa C - ko te kaiahuwhenua te rangatira o te mōkihi "B" te tangata tika mō ngā tūkinotanga i takea mai i te pūnaha wai.

Ahakoa i hangaia te pūnaha wai e te kaihautū i mua i te hoko i te mōkihi "B" ki te kaiahuwhenua, kāore he kōrero mō te pūnaha wai i roto i te tuhinga hoko (deed). Nā reira, kāore pea te kaiahuwhenua i mōhio ki te pūnaha wai, ā, kāore hoki ia i whakaae ki taua pūnaha wai i te wā i hokona te whenua.

I te mea kei te puta mai ngā tūkinotanga i te pūnaha wai e rere ana mā te mōkihi "B" o te kaiahuwhenua, māna te kawenga ināianei mō aua tūkinotanga. Ahakoa nā te kaihautū te hē i te tīmatanga, kua neke te rangatiratanga me te kawenga ki te kaiahuwhenua hou.

Kāore he mana ā-ture o te kaihautū ki te whakauru i tētahi pūnaha wai ki te whenua o tētahi atu e whakaputa ana i ngā tūkinotanga. Nā reira, ko te kaiahuwhenua te tangata tika mō ngā tūkinotanga i tēnei wā.

Question:
Kua whakaaturia e te rangahau mō te whiwhinga reo tuarua ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei mō ngā tamariki e whiwhi ana i tētahi reo tuarua
A.Kua takawaretia to rātau whanaketanga hinengaro
B.He pai ake to rātau toi i nga tamariki ehara i te reorua
C.Kaore he pānga o to rātau reo māori ki te mokatere o te whiwhi i te reo tuarua
D.Kua nui ake te ngāwari o te hinengaro hinengaro
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te D: Kua nui ake te ngāwari o te hinengaro hinengaro.

Kua whakaaturia e ngā rangahau mō te whiwhinga reo tuarua, he maha ngā hua o te ako i tētahi reo tuarua mō ngā tamariki. Tētahi o aua hua ko te whakapiki i te ngāwari o te hinengaro, arā, te āheinga ki te huri i waenga i ngā mahi rerekē, me te āta whakaaro mō ngā tūāhua rerekē.

Nā te mōhio ki ngā reo e rua, me ngā pūnaha wetereo rerekē, ka āhei ngā tamariki reorua ki te whakaaro i runga i ngā huarahi rerekē, ā, ka whanake tō rātau āheinga ki te whakawhiti i waenga i aua huarahi whakaaro. Ka āwhina tēnei i a rātau ki te whakaoti i ngā mahi uaua, me te tere huri i waenga i ngā mahi rerekē.

Nō reira, kāore e tika te kōrero kua takawaretia te whanaketanga hinengaro o ngā tamariki reorua, kāore rānei he pānga o tō rātau reo Māori ki te mokatere o te whiwhi i te reo tuarua. Waihoki, ehara i te mea he pai ake tō rātau toi i ngā tamariki kāore i te reorua. Engari, ko te mea nui ko te ngāwari ake o te hinengaro i runga i te ako i tētahi reo tuarua.

Question:
Ko te tangata te rangatira o te hōtēra hou i hangaia i roto i te taone. I te 15 o Poutāpeta, ka whiwhi waea taua tangata mai i tētahi kaihoko, he kaiwhakanoa taonga hōtēra. Ka tono te kaihoko ki te hoko i te tangata e 1,000 nga whakapoko ahi mo tana hōtēra. Ka kī atu te kaihoko ki te tangata ko te utu o nga whakapoko ahi ko te $35,000 (te $35 rānei), e utu ana i te 90 rā i muri i te tukunga. I kī taurangi te kaihoko kia tāutatia nga whakapoko ahi ā muri ake i te 15 o Āperira. I te 16 o Poutāpeta, ka waea atu te tangata ki te kaihoko, a, ka whakaae ki te tāpae. I te rā e whai ake nei, ka tukuna e te tangata te manatu e whai ake nei ki te kaihoko:"Kia tohutohutia koa kia 15 ōrau te utu mo te utu moni e whitu rā i muri i te tāutanga. " No te 20 o Poutāpeta ka whiwhi te kaihoko i nga tuhinga a te tangata. I te 1 o Āperira, ka tukuna e te kaihoko he waea ki taua tangata, e kī ana: "E mārama ana kāore i a mātau he kānataraki whakaū. Kaore ahau e tuku i nga whakapoko ahi i te 15 o Āperira, i tētahi atu wā rānei. "Ka mauria mai e te tangata he hūtu ki te kaihoko mo te takakino i te kānataraki. E whakapuaki ana te kaihoko i te āraitanga o te tikanga tinihanga i raro i te UCC. Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei te kōrero tino tika e pā ana ki nga ārai a te kaihoko?
A.He whaimana te ārai a te kaihoko, notemea kāore i tika te manatu a taua tangata ki te tohu i hangaia he kānataraki.
B.He whaimana te ārai a te kaihoko, no te mea he maiorooro te manatu a taua tangata ki nga tikanga o te tukunga waha a te kaihoko.
C.Kāore te ārai a te kaihoko i te whaimana, nā te mea kaore te kaihoko i urupare ki te manatu o te tangata i roto i tētahi wā tika.
D.Kāore te parenga a te kaihoko i te whaimana, nā te mea i raro i te UCC kāore e pā ana ki ngā whakaaetanga i waenganui i ngā kaihokohoko.
GivenAnswer:
C. Kāore te ārai a te kaihoko i te whaimana, nā te mea kaore te kaihoko i urupare ki te manatu o te tangata i roto i tētahi wā tika.

I raro i te Ture Hokohoko Whānui (UCC), mehemea ka tuku tētahi pāti i tētahi tāpaetanga ki tētahi atu pāti, me urupare te pāti e whiwhi ana i te tāpaetanga i roto i te wā tika ki te whakamōhio atu mēnā kāore rātou e whakaae ana ki ngā rerekētanga i roto i te tāpaetanga. Mēnā kāore te pāti e urupare ana, ka noho te kore urupare hei whakaaetanga ki ngā rerekētanga.

I tēnei take, i tuku te tangata i tētahi tāpaetanga me tētahi rerekētanga (te 15% utu mō te utu moata) ki te kaihoko. Kāore te kaihoko i urupare ki tēnei tāpaetanga i roto i te wā tika hei whakamōhio atu e whakahē ana ia i te rerekētanga. Nā reira, i raro i te UCC, kua whakaae te kaihoko ki te rerekētanga mā te kore urupare, ā, kua hangaia he kirimana i waenganui i ngā rōpū e rua. Nō reira, kāore te ārai a te kaihoko e mea ana kāore he kirimana i te whaimana.
